I took an excerpt from this book and 
used it in my essay.

sentence_trans: 英语中有五个元音字母，它们是a、e、i、o、u。

mean_cn: adj. 不便的，打扰的；打扰的

sentence_trans: 通过望远镜，你可以看到许多遥远的星星。

sentence:
A dozen eggs now cost twenty 
dollars—how expensive!

mean_cn: v. 探知，弄清，查明（真相等）

mean_cn: n.气球；热气球；  v.猛增；膨胀

mean_cn: adj.自然界的；天然的；正常的；天生的

sentence: They enjoyed sailing at sea and watching the sunset.

sentence: Wood can be used to build houses.

mean_cn: n. 检查员，督察员；视察者，检阅者；<英>查票员

sentence_trans: 该检查员正在检查工厂里的机器。

sentence: She is posting the letter.

mean_cn: v. 使转向，使改道（或绕道）

mean_cn: v. 阻碍，妨碍，阻塞，堵塞

mean_cn: adj. 数字的，用数字表示的

sentence: This prison has been abandoned for many years.

mean_cn: v.说话，谈及；说（某种语言）；演讲

sentence: Their wedding anniversary was a very special day to them.

mean_cn: v.提供，给予；使成为，致使，使处于（某种状态）；粉刷，往（墙上）抹灰
sentence: The kind teacher rendered a lot of financial assistance to her poor students.

mean_cn: n.文化；文明；（细菌或细胞）培养；（作物）种植

sentence_trans: 中国是一个具有深厚文化和历史底蕴的美丽国家。

sentence: There are twelve months in a year.

sentence: These are so expensive! You shouldn't have bought them for me! (Actually, yes, you should have.)
sentence_trans: 这太贵重了！你不该买给我的。（好吧，其实我想要。）

sentence_trans: 每个人都非常感谢医疗队。他们站在路边，满怀谢意地与医疗队员们挥手告别。

mean_cn: adj. 复发的；周期性的，经常发生的

sentence: Use this dictionary if there are any words you don't know.
sentence_trans: 如果有不认识的单词，用这本字典查查。

sentence: The woman is listening to the radio with a cup of coffee in her hand.
sentence_trans: 这位女士手端着咖啡，正在听收音机。

mean_cn: v. 点火，照亮；  adj. 不严重的；  n. 光亮；  adv. 轻轻地
sentence: She is lighting a candle.

sentence: This remote area is inaccessible to all but the most adventurous.

sentence: From grasslands to deserts, there are many different types of terrain around the world.
sentence_trans: 从草原到沙漠，世界上有很多种不同的地形。

mean_cn: n. 雄鹿；  v. 马弓背踢后腿挑起

sentence_trans: 这只雄鹿站在雪地上。

sentence: You can use eye shadow to heighten the beauty of your eyes.
sentence_trans: 你可以用眼影使眼睛看上去更加美丽。

mean_cn: vt. 放下武器；使人消除敌意

sentence_trans: 当警察用枪指着歹徒时，歹徒被解除了武器。

mean_cn: n. （时间、金钱等的）花费，支出，消耗

mean_cn: v. （生意等）成功；（城市、文化、植物生长等）繁荣
sentence: After struggling initially, his business began to prosper.
sentence_trans: 经过最初的奋斗，他的生意开始取得成功。

mean_cn: adj. 有长短针的；  n. 类似物；  adj. 模拟的；  n. 模拟
sentence: An analog watch utilizes a pointer on a dial rather than digitized numbers.
sentence_trans: 不同于以数字形式显示时间的手表，指针式手表通过表盘上的指针显示时间。

sentence: His encouragement made her run even faster.
sentence_trans: 在他的鼓励之下，她跑得更快了。

mean_cn: v. 口授；听写；规定；命令

sentence_trans: 我向我的秘书口述一封信件。

mean_cn: n. 不光彩，耻辱；  v. 使受耻辱

sentence_trans: 最终比分给我带来了巨大的耻辱。

sentence: The woman is in a retrospective mood while looking at old photos.
sentence_trans: 这位女士看着老照片缅怀过去。

mean_cn: v. 冲掉；脸红；清除；赶出；  n. 发红；  adj. 完全齐平的

sentence_trans: 方便过后要记得冲厕所哦。

sentence: The metallic armor will protect me in the war!
sentence_trans: 在战斗中，这件金属盔甲可以保护我！

sentence: My boss is bossy and dogmatic.

sentence: The electrician measured how many kilowatt-hours I was using.

mean_cn: adj.醒着的；  v.（使）醒来；唤起，被唤起
sentence: It's already 3:22 a.m., but she is still awake.
sentence_trans: 现在已经是凌晨3点22分了，但她还醒着。

mean_cn: n. 巢；温床；  v. 筑巢；嵌入

sentence_trans: 大多数鸟儿把蛋生在它们的巢穴里。

sentence: The pressure sensor will show you if the pressure in the pipe is too high.
sentence_trans: 当管道压力过大时，压力传感器会显示出来。

mean_cn: v.指挥；进行；组织，安排，带领；传导（电、热等）；  n.行为举止；引导
sentence: He is conducting an orchestra.
sentence_trans: 他正指挥着一支交响乐团。

sentence: He was seemingly happy, but we didn't know how sad he really was.

mean_cn: n. 【影视】（译文）字幕，（书籍）副标题

sentence: Please open your books to the first chapter.

sentence: Good eyes are required for detection of tiny objects.

sentence: This investor is always keen to fund new businesses with innovative ideas.
sentence_trans: 这位投资者一直热衷于为有创新想法的新企业提供资金。

sentence: Your dog is really cute.

sentence: The man is driving along the coast.
sentence_trans: 这个男人沿着海边开着车。

sentence: After tasting the cake, the little boy shows a cheerful expression.

sentence: I would love a bowl of mild chicken soup right now.

mean_cn: adj.整个的，总体的；  n.总数

sentence_trans: 池塘里一共有多少只鸭子呢？

sentence: This is unfair! Why is he more important than us!

mean_cn: adv.在世界各地；  adj.全世界的

mean_cn: adj.邪恶的；  n.邪恶，罪恶，恶行

mean_cn: n.（复数）储蓄金，存款；节省，节约；储蓄
sentence: I put all of my money into savings instead of spending it.
sentence_trans: 我把我所有的钱都放在储蓄金里，而不是花掉。

mean_cn: adj. 不知道的，未知的，不知名的

sentence_trans: 不明飞行物从何而来仍是未知的。

mean_cn: adj.异常狂暴的；蠢笨的；精神错乱的；生气的，狂怒的；  n.狂怒
sentence: He got mad with so much work.
sentence_trans: 如此多的文书工作令他发狂。

sentence: The northern lights are a breathtaking natural phenomenon.

sentence: Pondering what to eat every day can be a challenge with many options.

mean_cn: adj. 白天的，日间的；  n. 白天

sentence_trans: 猫头鹰晚上觅食，所以充足的日间睡眠对猫头鹰很重要。

sentence_trans: 我花了所有钱给你买这条精致的项链。

mean_cn: n. 衰退；  v. 【语】使发生词尾变化，使变格

mean_cn: v. 扔，抛，投掷；  n. 投，掷

sentence: She has finished her meal.

mean_cn: n.比拟，比喻；类比；相似，类似

sentence_trans: 鼓吹帝国主义的虎王想要扩张自己的疆域。

sentence_trans: 我对哪种车花费更少的油做了比较研究，然后选择了最小的那辆。

sentence: The intonation of their singing harmonized beautifully with the music.

sentence: The deformation in this key makes it unusable.

mean_cn: v. 建造，制造，伪造（文件等），捏造，编造（谎言、借口等）
sentence: The man tried to fabricate the signature.
sentence_trans: 他试图仿造签名。

sentence: The sunrise is so amazing!

mean_cn: adj. 温文尔雅的，懂礼的；都【城】市气派的

sentence_trans: 他们在鸡尾酒会上的谈话既老练又文雅。

sentence: Every pea in the pod is akin to the other.

sentence: Basically, all the students are depressed during a hard English examination.

sentence: I miss the time when my mother would tell me "goodnight" at bedtime.

mean_cn: adj.聪明的；时髦的，衣着讲究的；  vi.难过，烦恼
sentence: The girl is so smart that she can solve very difficult math problems.
sentence_trans: 这个女孩很聪明，她能解很难的数学题。

mean_cn: v. 下降，下来；突然访问；下移，下降

mean_cn: adj. 不合逻辑的，不合理的

sentence: This environmental worker's hypocrisy even made him dump trash in the ocean after collecting it.

请问有什么需要吗？

sentence: We are knit together by mutual dependence.

sentence: After high school the boy went to study at college.

mean_cn: adj. 熟练的，有技能的；需要熟练技术的

sentence_trans: 他是位技能熟练的工厂工人。

sentence: The advent of stone tools enhanced the hunting abilities of humans.

sentence: Whoever wins this race wins the championship.

mean_cn: v.连接；与……有同感；把……联系起来

sentence_trans: 我的手机正连接着电脑。

sentence: All of them are international students from different countries.
sentence_trans: 他们都是来自不同国家的国际学生。

sentence: I often think about the meaning of life and other questions of philosophy.

mean_cn: n.尘土，沙土；  v.撒上粉末；掸掉，擦去

sentence_trans: 车从土路上全速驶过，激起漫天的尘土。

sentence: The train is traveling at a speed of 300 km/h!

mean_cn: adj.显然的，明白无误的，明了的；  v.使显现，使显露，表明

mean_cn: n.融合，合并；核聚变；熔合物

mean_cn: n. 混乱，杂乱，（头脑的）糊涂；  v. （使）混乱，（使）迷惑，混淆

mean_cn: n. 添加剂，添加物；  adj. 【数】加法的

sentence_trans: 房东威胁租客，如果再不付房租就把他赶出去。

sentence: What a cute child!

mean_cn: n.原因；  v.论证，推理，劝说

The wretched old lady lives in poor 
conditions.

Obviously they are flirting with each 
other.

sentence: Sediment is solid material that settles at the bottom of a liquid.

mean_cn: n.毛巾，手巾；  v.用毛巾擦干

sentence: We looked in on my grandmother on our way back home.

sentence_trans: 如果一株植物能至少存活三季，它就是多年生的。

mean_cn: vi. 躺，斜倚（常与on，upon或against连用）；  vt. 使后靠，使斜倚

sentence_trans: 新粉刷的房间散发出一股难闻的有毒气味，使这个男孩感到不舒服。

sentence_trans: 城市下水道系统将废水排走，然后再进行处理。

sentence_trans: 他终日游手好闲却幻想一夜暴富，真是太荒唐可笑了！

sentence: The yoga instructor is helping the novice into position.

sentence_trans: 每当朋友有困难时，她总是会支持她们。

sentence: His father stuck to his promise and bought his son the new toy.
sentence_trans: 他的父亲信守承诺，给儿子买了新玩具。

sentence: This beautiful pier is a famous tourist attraction.

sentence_trans: 他由于喝啤酒太多，肚子已经突出来了。

mean_cn: n.（天灾、战争等造成的）大破坏，大毁灭；  vi.损毁；  vt.严重破坏

sentence: There's a bee on the yellow flower.
sentence_trans: 这朵黄花上有一只蜜蜂。

sentence: This book contains factual information about science.
sentence_trans: 这本书里有关于科学的事实性信息。

sentence: Vampires' weakness is that they are afraid of sunshine.
sentence_trans: 吸血鬼的弱点是害怕阳光。

sentence: She hastily ran to the train before it departed.
sentence_trans: 她在发车前慌忙地跑向火车。

sentence: People are walking at the crossroads.
sentence_trans: 人们漫步在十字路口。

sentence: I have a nice suit, but as you can see, I'm penniless.
sentence_trans: 虽然我穿着漂亮的外套，但是如你所见，我身无分文。

sentence: My grandma has to depend on a wheelchair.
sentence_trans: 我的奶奶必须依靠轮椅出行。

sentence: She was sunburnt after doing some sunbathing.
sentence_trans: 日光浴后她晒伤了。

sentence: His surfing skills are truly awesome!
sentence_trans: 他的冲浪技术实在是非常好。

sentence: The narrow alley winds through the old town.
sentence_trans: 这条窄巷弯弯曲曲地穿过古老的小镇。

sentence: Cotton feels soft and can be used to make clothes.
sentence_trans: 棉花摸起来很柔软，可以用来制作衣服。

sentence: He always has to wear a shirt and tie to work.
sentence_trans: 他总是穿衬衫打领带去工作。

mean_cn: n. 剩菜；残余物；  adj. 残余的
sentence: The leftovers were thrown into the trash bin.
sentence_trans: 剩菜被倒进了垃圾桶。

sentence: The greengrocer sells vegetables and fruit.
sentence_trans: 这个果蔬商卖蔬菜和水果。

sentence: She has a nice smile.
sentence_trans: 她的笑容很美好。

mean_cn: vi. 安静下来；  vt. 使安静
sentence: "Hush, please be quiet."
sentence_trans: “嘘，请安静一点。”

sentence: A diver swims underwater using special breathing equipment.
sentence_trans: 潜水员使用特殊的呼吸设备在水下游动。

sentence: These fictional characters are based on real animals.
sentence_trans: 这些虚构人物是基于真实的动物。

sentence: The bridegroom is dressed in a suit with a white rose.
sentence_trans: 新郎穿着一件西装，胸口别着一朵玫瑰。

sentence: The dog is having fun in the courtyard.
sentence_trans: 狗狗在院子里愉快地玩耍。

mean_cn: adj. 令人不快的，讨厌的
sentence: There's an unpleasant smell coming out from the refrigerator.
sentence_trans: 有股难闻的味道从冰箱里冒了出来。

sentence: You can't see bacteria without a microscope.
sentence_trans: 细菌只有在显微镜下才能被看到。

sentence: Music was recorded on this compact disk(CD).
sentence_trans: 音乐被刻录在这张光盘上。

sentence: The consumers buy many goods from the supermarket.
sentence_trans: 消费者从超市里购买许多商品。

sentence: People say she's warm-hearted, because she loves helping others!
sentence_trans: 人们说她很热心，因为她喜欢帮助别人！

sentence: They looked at the huge pyramid in wonderment.
sentence_trans: 他们惊奇地看着巨大的金字塔。

sentence: It would be unwise to buy a house without researching its surroundings.
sentence_trans: 在不了解房子周围环境的情况下买它是很不明智的。

sentence: The movie features her in a supporting role.
sentence_trans: 她在这部电影中担任配角。

mean_cn: adj. 可重复使用的，可多次使用的
sentence: Reusable shopping bags are environmentally-friendly.
sentence_trans: 可重复使用的购物袋是环保的。

sentence: Today is May Day and, more importantly, it's his mother's birthday.
sentence_trans: 今天是五一劳动节，更重要的是，今天是他妈妈的生日。

sentence: There is a fire extinguisher fixed to the wall.
sentence_trans: 墙上有一个灭火器。

sentence: Shanxi Province is famous for its vinegar.
sentence_trans: 山西省以醋闻名。

sentence: This rosebud will eventually bloom into a beautiful flower.
sentence_trans: 这个玫瑰花蕾最终将会绽放成美丽的花。

mean_cn: adv. 技术上，专门地，学术上，工艺上
sentence: Smart phones are much more technically advanced than the first mobile phones.
sentence_trans: 智能手机在技术上比第一代手机先进得多。

sentence: She gets on well with lots of animals, and they love her.
sentence_trans: 她跟许多动物相处融洽，它们都很喜欢她。

sentence: She gives the book back to him.
sentence_trans: 她把书还给了他。

sentence: The frog is jumping into the water.
sentence_trans: 这只青蛙正跳入水中。

sentence: The man with glasses is a heavy smoker.
sentence_trans: 这个戴眼镜的男人是一个重度吸烟者。

mean_cn: adv. 精神上，智力上，心理上
sentence: She looks as if she is mentally tired.
sentence_trans: 她看起来精神疲惫。

sentence: I'm wearing my raincoat, so I don't have to worry about the rain.
sentence_trans: 我穿了雨衣，这样就不怕被雨淋了。

sentence: She saw an unbelievable video on her computer of a dog doing yoga.
sentence_trans: 她在电脑上看到了一段令人难以置信的视频，一只狗竟然在做瑜伽。

sentence: The two boxers are waiting for a chance to strike in the boxing match.
sentence_trans: 在这场拳击比赛中，两位拳击手都在等待时机进行攻击。

sentence: Her passport was due for renewal as its expiration date approached.
sentence_trans: 她的护照在临近到期日时进行了更新。

sentence: The bride looks like an angel in her white dress.
sentence_trans: 这个穿着白色婚纱的新娘看起来像个天使。

sentence: The selfish boy doesn't share the candies with the other kids.
sentence_trans: 这个自私的小男孩不跟其他小朋友分享糖果。

sentence: She lies on the sofa, reading a book.
sentence_trans: 她躺在沙发上看书。

sentence: He is such a skilled craftsman! The plate looks so amazing!
sentence_trans: 他是一个手艺如此精湛的工匠！这个盘子画得太棒了！

mean_cn: n.适应，适应性的变化；改编，改写本
sentence: Arctic foxes changing color seasonally is an example of adaptation to the environment.
sentence_trans: 北极狐季节性的变色是适应环境的一个例子。

sentence: Although her pregnancy was unplanned, they were still looking forward to the baby.
sentence_trans: 虽然她的怀孕在计划之外，但他们仍旧期待这个孩子的到来。

sentence: He outdrove his opponent and won the race.
sentence_trans: 他开车比对手快，赢得了比赛。

sentence: This fallen tree is lying on the lawn.
sentence_trans: 这棵倒下的树压在了草坪上。

sentence: This is a closely contested basketball game.
sentence_trans: 这场篮球比赛比分很接近。

sentence: You can see from above how the river meanders.
sentence_trans: 你可以从高处看到这条河流的蜿蜒曲折。

sentence: The kebabs in the plate look delicious.
sentence_trans: 盘子里的烤肉串看起来很好吃。

sentence: My selfless boyfriend offered me the last food we had.
sentence_trans: 我无私的男朋友把最后的食物给了我。

sentence: The lotus flower floats on the water.
sentence_trans: 莲花漂浮在水面上。

mean_cn: adj. 教育的；有教育意义的

sentence_trans: 好吧，这就是教育的全过程。

mean_cn: n. 天空；  v. 将……击向空中
sentence: There are white clouds in the blue sky.
sentence_trans: 蓝蓝的天空中飘着白色的云朵。

sentence: I used ink to write some nice Spring Festival wishes.
sentence_trans: 我用墨水写了些春节祝福。

sentence: Carried by aircraft, airmail is much quicker than regular mail.
sentence_trans: 用飞机运送的航空邮件比平邮快很多。

sentence: Who was making her cry? I hoped it wasn't me.
sentence_trans: 谁把她弄哭了？我希望不是我。

sentence: A Rabbit jet entered Cat airspace without permission.
sentence_trans: 兔子国喷气式飞机未经允许闯入了猫国的领空。

sentence: I can't stand the smelly fruit anymore!
sentence_trans: 我受不了这么臭的水果了！

sentence: The wheat here has turned yellow.
sentence_trans: 这儿的小麦已经变黄了。

sentence: He's so easy-going that he never loses his temper!
sentence_trans: 他为人随和，从不发脾气！

sentence: The translator is converting the English news report into Chinese.
sentence_trans: 这名译者正在把英文新闻报道翻译成中文。

mean_cn: adj. 蓝色的；  n. 蓝色
sentence: There are a few white clouds in the blue sky.
sentence_trans: 蓝色的天空里飘荡着朵朵白云。

sentence: The five rings are the symbol of the Olympic Games.
sentence_trans: 五环是奥运会的象征。

sentence: The discovery of this medicine was a great advance in human history.
sentence_trans: 这种药物的发现是人类历史上的一大进步。

sentence: He hungers for victory.
sentence_trans: 他渴望胜利。

sentence: The date of the party conflicts with her final maths exam.
sentence_trans: 聚会的日期与她期末数学考试的日子冲突了。

mean_cn: phr. （系统、想法、信仰）兼容的，能和谐相处的
sentence: This set of headphones is compatible with any mobile device.
sentence_trans: 这副耳机适用于所有移动设备。

sentence: He made an approach to the seller, asking how much he wanted for the house.
sentence_trans: 他和卖家接洽，询问这栋房子他想卖多少钱。

sentence: This car was completely written off.
sentence_trans: 这辆车完全报废了。

sentence: She keeps working at the violin, improving as time goes by.
sentence_trans: 她坚持拉小提琴，随着时间的推移而不断进步。

sentence: This book is obviously out of place.
sentence_trans: 这本书显然放错位置了。

sentence: When she's off duty, her main hobby is nature photography.
sentence_trans: 下班后，她的主要爱好是自然摄影。

sentence: He mistook her for a famous actress.
sentence_trans: 他误认为她是一位著名的女演员。

sentence: Since there was no butter for her bread, she had to go without.
sentence_trans: 因为没有黄油配面包了，她只好将就一下。

sentence: His sick friend couldn't go to the hospital alone, so he went along with him.
sentence_trans: 他朋友生病，没办法一个人上医院，所以他陪他一起去。

sentence: The works of Confucius are familiar to people all over the world.
sentence_trans: 孔子的著作为全世界人民所熟悉。

sentence: His views on coffee fall in with mine.
sentence_trans: 他对咖啡的看法和我的一致。

sentence: He left his bus pass at home but could do without it.
sentence_trans: 他把公交卡忘在家里了，但没带也行。

sentence: After his bath, my dog likes me to clothe him in his own little bathrobe.
sentence_trans: 洗澡后，狗狗喜欢我给它穿上它自己的浴袍。

sentence: It takes time for children to adapt to school life.
sentence_trans: 孩子们需要一段时间来适应学校生活。

sentence: Although it's noisy, he still manages to concentrate on his work.
sentence_trans: 尽管很吵，他仍然可以聚精会神地工作。

mean_cn: n. 光标；（计算尺的）【计】游标，指针
sentence: Move the cursor and click "OK", then you can log into the system.
sentence_trans: 移动光标并点击“确认”，你就可以登录进系统了。

sentence: They wanted to stay together for good.
sentence_trans: 他们想要永远在一起。

sentence: The white cat was blackened having fallen down the chimney.
sentence_trans: 白猫掉进烟囱里变黑了。

sentence: The boy is looking up words in the dictionary.
sentence_trans: 这个男孩正在字典里查找单词。

sentence: They are putting up a tent.
sentence_trans: 他们正在搭帐篷。

sentence: He turned down the proposal and refused to sign it.
sentence_trans: 他拒绝了这个提案，不愿在上面签字。

sentence: This football player longs for his team to win the cup.
sentence_trans: 这位足球运动员渴望他们球队赢得奖杯。

sentence: His neighbor always puts his trash bags in the way of his car.
sentence_trans: 他的邻居总是把垃圾袋放在他的车面前挡道。

mean_cn: adj.困惑的；混乱的；  vt.使困惑
sentence: I get confused when the two of you tell me different things.
sentence_trans: 你们俩对我讲不同的事，我开始迷糊了。

sentence: This restaurant has a great reputation for excellent service.
sentence_trans: 这家餐馆以其优质的服务而闻名。

sentence: The constant crying of our neighbor's baby is starting to get annoying.
sentence_trans: 邻居家宝宝持续不断的哭声开始变得特别烦人了。

sentence: Seeing that he was in some difficulty, she offered to help.
sentence_trans: 看到他处境困难，她主动帮了一把。

mean_cn: phr. 有关…的投诉，抱怨，不满
sentence: He is making a complaint about the noise upstairs to the police.
sentence_trans: 他正在向警察投诉楼上的噪音。

sentence: She used milk in place of cream, which she had none of.
sentence_trans: 她没有奶油，就用牛奶来代替。

sentence: She is on the phone complaining about the bad service.
sentence_trans: 她正在电话里抱怨服务不好。

sentence: The landslide hindered the relief supplies from being delivered to the disaster area.
sentence_trans: 滑坡阻碍了救援物资被运往灾区。

sentence: He plunged into the sea with a loud splash.
sentence_trans: 他咚地一声跳进了海里。

sentence: His main job is a writer, but he also runs a stall on the side.
sentence_trans: 他的主业是作家，但也同时兼职摆地摊。

sentence: He did his buttons up all on his own.
sentence_trans: 他自己把纽扣全都扣上了。

mean_cn: phr. 把（时间、力量等）用在……

sentence_trans: 她把时间用于工作和带孩子上。

mean_cn: phr. 为某事向某人祝贺

sentence_trans: 大家都在欢呼祝贺他的胜利！

sentence: The dog was confined to the circle.
sentence_trans: 这条狗被限制在这个圈内活动。

sentence: He is confident of his future success.
sentence_trans: 他对将来成功充满信心。

sentence: Although the book had been hard to come by, she finally found a copy!
sentence_trans: 尽管这本书很难得到，她最终还是找到了一本！

sentence: This is by far the fastest he has ever run 100 meters.
sentence_trans: 这是迄今为止他跑100米最快的一次。

sentence: She set many alarms the previous night, lest she was late again.
sentence_trans: 她睡前设了超多闹钟，以免再次迟到。

sentence: The flight from Moscow arrived on schedule but all the others are delayed.
sentence_trans: 只有来自莫斯科的航班按时到达，其他航班全体延误。

sentence: I go jogging from time to time.
sentence_trans: 我时不时地去慢跑一下。

sentence: There is no doubt that the answer is four.
sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，这个答案是4。

sentence: He is much stronger than me, but I managed to hold out against him for 60 seconds.
sentence_trans: 他比我强壮多了，但我能够坚持和他对抗60秒！

sentence: I stood on a banana peel by accident and slipped over.
sentence_trans: 我意外地踩到香蕉皮滑倒了。

sentence: He got off to a bad start, but in the end he won the race.
sentence_trans: 他出发时不很顺利，但是最终赢得了比赛。

mean_cn: phr. 同意某人的看法，与某人看法一致
sentence: He and I both agree with each other.
sentence_trans: 他和我都同意了对方的观点。

mean_cn: n. 时事通讯，业务通讯
sentence: From our newsletter, you can learn about how to take good care of your pets.
sentence_trans: 从我们的时事简讯中，你能学会如何照顾好你的宠物。

sentence: She felt great sympathy for the injured cat and bandaged its wound.
sentence_trans: 她很同情这只受伤的猫咪并为它的伤口做了包扎。

mean_cn: phr. 适于作(有担任...的资格)
sentence: From the three applicants, he is considered to be most qualified for the job.
sentence_trans: 在三名申请者中，他被认为是最有资格胜任这项工作的。

sentence: He is totally full up and can eat no more.
sentence_trans: 他吃得很饱了，再也吃不下了。

sentence: He is very sensitive to being touched.
sentence_trans: 他对被触碰太敏感了。

sentence: He scraped through the exam.
sentence_trans: 他勉强通过了这次考试。

sentence: He breathed into his hands to warm them up.
sentence_trans: 他朝手哈气让其暖和起来。

sentence: He was about to choose A, but on second thoughts he chose C.
sentence_trans: 他本来要选A，经重新考虑后，他选了C。

sentence: He is going to knock down the wall.
sentence_trans: 他要把这面墙拆掉。

sentence: The train is drawing in and people are waiting at the platform.
sentence_trans: 火车到站了，人们正在站台上等着。

sentence: Although not permitted inside, he could, by all means, use his phone outside.
sentence_trans: 尽管室内禁止通话，但他还是可以在室外接电话。

sentence: The teacher was at a loss when her student couldn't answer the simple question.
sentence_trans: 当发现她的学生解不出这个简单的问题时，老师困惑不解。

sentence: Tellers deal with customers face-to-face in the bank, including giving and receiving cash.
sentence_trans: 银行出纳员与客户面对面打交道，包括给出和收取现金。

sentence: Since I lost my ability to walk, I counted on my daughter every day.
sentence_trans: 我双腿残疾了，每天不得不依靠我的女儿来（照顾我）。

sentence: She is aiming at the target.
sentence_trans: 她正瞄准靶心。

mean_cn: phr. 出毛病，运转不正常
sentence: He is angry because the washing machine is out of order.
sentence_trans: 他有点生气，因为洗衣机出毛病了。

sentence: He is in a hurry to go to work!
sentence_trans: 他急着赶去上班。

sentence: Sometimes I hear from relatives in a Christmas letter.
sentence_trans: 有时我收到亲戚们的圣诞来信。

sentence: This is an application to a college.
sentence_trans: 这是给一所大学的申请书。

sentence: He did not know the reason for his deskmate's absence from school.
sentence_trans: 他不知道自己同桌缺课的原因。

sentence: Despite already having a PhD, he's still thirsty for more knowledge.
sentence_trans: 尽管已经有了博士学位，他仍然渴望学习更多的知识。

mean_cn: n. 对...的反应；回答，回应
sentence: The firefighters were praised for their rapid response to the fire.
sentence_trans: 消防队员因对火灾的迅速反应而受到赞扬。

sentence: To practice social distancing, he resigned himself to watching the football match alone at home.
sentence_trans: 为了实行社交隔离，他只好安于独自在家看球赛。

sentence: She often wonders at the complexity of the universe.
sentence_trans: 她经常对宇宙的复杂而感到惊奇。

sentence: The bad food made him throw up.
sentence_trans: 这个食物让他吐了。

sentence: He is travelling to another city on business.
sentence_trans: 他正要去另一个城市出差。

sentence: His success lies in his ability to mix unique flavors that no one else can.
sentence_trans: 他的成功在于他能调出其他人调不出的独特口味。

sentence: He continued on his way, ignorant of the danger which lay ahead.
sentence_trans: 他继续赶路，对前面潜伏的危险一无所知。

sentence: The director is content with the filming of this scene.
sentence_trans: 导演对这一幕的拍摄很满意。

sentence: He attributed his cold to the changeable weather.
sentence_trans: 他将感冒归因于这多变的天气。

sentence: Chengdu may have some smog, but on the whole is still a great city!
sentence_trans: 成都也许有些雾霾，但大体上依然是个很棒的城市！

sentence: After years of hard work, he finally succeeded in the music industry.
sentence_trans: 在多年的努力过后，他终于在音乐行业取得成功。

sentence: We should eat some healthy food, for example some apples.
sentence_trans: 我们应该吃一些健康的食物，例如苹果。

mean_cn: phr. 赶上；保持；不落后于；继续
sentence: The man is so fast that he can keep up with the horse!
sentence_trans: 那个人跑得很快，他都快赶上马了。

sentence: Her expression points to the fact that she receives good news.
sentence_trans: 她脸上的表情表明她收到了好消息。

sentence: The whole family got together for my birthday.
sentence_trans: 全家人为了庆祝我的生日，而聚在一起。

mean_cn: adj. 庆祝的，喜庆的，欢乐的，节日似的
sentence: The festive atmosphere was enhanced by the brilliant firework display.
sentence_trans: 绚丽烟花的绽放增强了节日的喜庆气氛。

sentence: Here is my following arrangement for my exercise.
sentence_trans: 这是我接下来的锻炼安排。

sentence: They are having an argument about who broke the vase.
sentence_trans: 他们在争吵是谁打碎了花瓶。

sentence: The child made a compromise between what he wanted and what his mother wanted.
sentence_trans: 这个孩子在自己的意愿和他妈妈的要求之间找到了一个折中点。

sentence: She regards him as her biggest enemy.
sentence_trans: 她将他视为自己最大的敌人。

sentence: The phone company disconnected my phone service because I didn't pay my bill.
sentence_trans: 电话公司切断了对我的服务，因为我没有付我的账单。

sentence: He was robbed of his wallet on the way back from the bank.
sentence_trans: 他在从银行回来的路上钱包被抢了。

sentence: The outcome of the movie was the opposite to what he had expected!
sentence_trans: 这部电影的结局和他预料的相反！

sentence: Two multiplied by three is six.
sentence_trans: 二乘以三等于六。

sentence: He has prevailed over his opponents and won the championship.
sentence_trans: 他战胜了对手，夺得了冠军。

sentence: His boss told him to do the report all over again.
sentence_trans: 老板让他把报告重新做一遍。

sentence: They're at the marathon, looking on with excitement.
sentence_trans: 他们在兴奋地看着马拉松比赛。

sentence: The number of teachers appointed is proportional to the total number of students.
sentence_trans: 指定的教师人数与学生总数成正比。

sentence: She was on the point of saying something to him when the phone rang.
sentence_trans: 她正要对他说些什么的时候，电话响了。

sentence: His silence was in effect a refusal.
sentence_trans: 他的沉默实际上是一种拒绝。

sentence: Her shoes go with her bag.
sentence_trans: 她的鞋子和她的包包相配。

sentence: The angry dog went for the man!
sentence_trans: 那只发怒的狗袭击了这个男人！

sentence: The kids all doubled up with laughter.
sentence_trans: 孩子们都笑弯了腰。

sentence: Her mother consented to her going on the roller coaster.
sentence_trans: 她妈妈同意她去坐过山车。

sentence: He took someone else's umbrella by mistake.
sentence_trans: 他错拿了别人的伞。

sentence: All his efforts to fetch water with a basket were in vain.
sentence_trans: 用竹篮子打水，他所有的努力都白费了。

sentence: She wants to eat out, but on the other hand, she should save money.
sentence_trans: 她想出去吃饭，但另一方面，她应该尽量省钱。

sentence: He pretends to be sick to get out of going to work.
sentence_trans: 他装病逃工。

sentence: I put down my schoolbag onto the desk.
sentence_trans: 我把书包放在了桌上。

sentence: He referred to the dictionary to get the exact meaning of the word.
sentence_trans: 他参考词典来了解那个词的确切意思。

sentence: Please fill in the form if you want to join our club.
sentence_trans: 如果你想加入我们俱乐部，请先填写这张表格。

sentence: We should find a balance between work and health.
sentence_trans: 我们应该找到工作和健康之间的平衡。

sentence: She appeals to us for protecting forests.
sentence_trans: 她呼吁我们要保护森林。

mean_cn: phr. 新接触的，不熟悉的
sentence: Coding was new to her  but it quickly became something she truly enjoyed.
sentence_trans: 虽然她才刚接触编程，但她很快就喜欢上了它。

sentence: The meaning of the smiling emoji is diverse from what it was.
sentence_trans: 这个微笑表情的含义与过去的不同了。

sentence: While preparing this dish, last but not least, remember to dress the plate exquisitely.
sentence_trans: 在准备这道料理时，最后但同样重要的是，要记得摆盘让这道菜更精致些。

sentence: Sea turtles swim so gracefully.
sentence_trans: 海龟的泳姿很优雅。

sentence: He informed on his boss in exchange for a softer punishment.
sentence_trans: 他告发了自己的老大，以便自己能被从轻发落。

mean_cn: phr. （对某种治疗）有良好反应
sentence: He has responded well to his recent hair loss treatment.
sentence_trans: 他最近的脱发治疗效果显著。

sentence: He pulled up at the traffic lights.
sentence_trans: 他在交通信号灯前停了下来。

sentence: He finally surrendered to temptation and ate the cupcake.
sentence_trans: 他最终还是屈服于诱惑，吃掉了那个小蛋糕。

sentence: The lion ranges over 75 square miles hunting for food.
sentence_trans: 狮子在75平方英里的范围内寻找食物。

mean_cn: n. 对...的信心；宗教信仰
sentence: He had a strong faith in the health benefits of garlic.
sentence_trans: 他坚信大蒜对健康有益。

sentence: He was delegated to represent the company at the annual conference.
sentence_trans: 公司委派他作为代表出席年度会议。

sentence: The blue whale is the largest living mammal in the world.
sentence_trans: 蓝鲸是世界上现存最大的哺乳动物。

sentence: He went back on his promise to his son.
sentence_trans: 他违背了对自己儿子的承诺。

sentence: The second chapter is concerned with the health of the elderly.
sentence_trans: 第二章所涉及的是老年人的健康问题。

sentence: The teacher told students that their answers should be short and to the point.
sentence_trans: 老师告诉学生他们的答案应该要简短而切题。

sentence: The couple usually sit and talk over their plans for the day over breakfast.
sentence_trans: 这对夫妻经常在吃早餐时讨论当天的计划。

sentence: The celebrities took exception to the flashing cameras.
sentence_trans: 这些名人反对被相机拍摄。

sentence: Having the brightness on full really runs down the battery!
sentence_trans: 把亮度调到最大会很快耗尽电池！

sentence: His big belly resulted from his bad eating habits.
sentence_trans: 他的大肚子是由他的不良饮食习惯导致的。

sentence: Piece the puzzle together to see the whole picture.
sentence_trans: 把拼图拼好来看完整的图像。

sentence: The new school was named after the former headteacher.
sentence_trans: 新学校是以前任校长的名字命名的。

mean_cn: vt. 弯下身（坐下、跪下、趴下）
sentence: The police told the criminal to get down on the ground.
sentence_trans: 警察要求这个罪犯趴倒在地。

mean_cn: phr. 与...截然不同，差别明显
sentence: These rooms' styles are very distinct from each other.
sentence_trans: 这两种房间风格明显不同。

sentence: The monk devoted his life to his faith.
sentence_trans: 这个僧人将他的一生都献给了信仰。

sentence: The man lost in the desert despaired of finding water.
sentence_trans: 在沙漠中迷路的男人对找到水已经不抱希望了。

sentence: The real beauty of her music consists in its ability to comfort and encourage others.
sentence_trans: 她的音乐之美在于能安慰和鼓励他人。

sentence: They communicate with each other by mobile phone.
sentence_trans: 他们通过手机相互交流。

sentence: He was a little worried about his colleague, who was unexpectedly absent from work.
sentence_trans: 他的同事突然缺勤了，这让他有些担心。

mean_cn: phr. 坚持，强调，坚决要求，督促
sentence: Although it's getting hot, his mother insisted on not turning on the air-conditioning.
sentence_trans: 虽然天气变热了，他妈妈还是坚持不开空调。

sentence: So far, I have traveled to 11 countries.
sentence_trans: 迄今为止，我已经到过11个国家旅游了。

sentence: I went to the store to pick out a smart jacket for my interview.
sentence_trans: 我去商店为我的采访挑选了一件时髦的外套。

sentence: A trustworthy friend always pays back the money he borrows.
sentence_trans: 一个值得信任的朋友是有借有还的。

sentence: He said no over and over again.
sentence_trans: 他一遍又一遍地说不。

sentence: She is sitting in front of the mirror in a long dress.
sentence_trans: 她穿着长裙坐在镜子前面。

sentence: The mother agrees to let her son drink some soda.
sentence_trans: 妈妈同意让她的儿子喝点汽水。

mean_cn: v. 举起；(在逆境中) 保持良好状况
sentence: They work together to hold up the ball.
sentence_trans: 他们合作举起了球。

sentence: I opened the fridge to get some food.
sentence_trans: 我打开冰箱，拿点食物。

sentence: There's a barrier to the bridge on the road.
sentence_trans: 路上有一个通往大桥的障碍。

sentence: The phone rings with a vibration.
sentence_trans: 手机铃声伴随着一阵震动响起。

sentence: He read of the traffic accident in the newspaper.
sentence_trans: 他从报纸上知道了这起交通事故。

mean_cn: phr. 在这种情况下；既然如此
sentence: Under the circumstances, his late arrival at school is understandable.
sentence_trans: 在这种情况下，他上学迟到是可以理解的。

sentence: His teammates restrained him from shouting at the referee.
sentence_trans: 他的队友竭力阻止他向裁判大吼大叫。

sentence: He just wanted a new car so he could get back on the road.
sentence_trans: 他只想要一辆新车以便重新上路。

sentence: These T-shirts vary in color.
sentence_trans: 这些T恤颜色各异。

mean_cn: phr. 很可能会发生的，可能性很大的
sentence: Footballers are liable to get injured if they don't warm up before a match.
sentence_trans: 如果不做赛前热身，足球运动员很可能会在运动过程中受伤。

sentence: He carried his bag on his front to guard against pickpockets.
sentence_trans: 他把包背在身前以防扒手。

sentence: There are three candidates for the general election.
sentence_trans: 有三位候选人参加全国竞选。

sentence: He is boasting about his past achievements to his son.
sentence_trans: 他在向儿子夸耀自己过去的成就。

sentence: He bought some new shoes which are very similar to a pair he had before.
sentence_trans: 他买的新鞋和他以前的那双很相似。

sentence: They are protesting against environmental damage.
sentence_trans: 他们正在抗议对环境的破坏。

sentence: The evil queen is jealous of her beauty.
sentence_trans: 邪恶的王后嫉妒她的美貌。

mean_cn: phr. 讨论中的，正在念叨的
sentence: The kitten in question is sleeping behind the tree.
sentence_trans: 他们所讨论的那只小猫正在树后睡觉。

sentence: She wants to exchange the red dress for a white one.
sentence_trans: 她想把这件红色的连衣裙换成白色的。

sentence: These pills cured him of his cough.
sentence_trans: 这些药丸治好了他的咳嗽。

sentence: The sale at the mall called forth customers' urge to shop.
sentence_trans: 商场的大减价唤起了顾客们强烈的购物欲。

sentence: The only thing the boy wants to do is to break away from school.
sentence_trans: 这个男孩只想逃离学校。

sentence: The nurse attends to her patients carefully.
sentence_trans: 护士认真且温柔地照顾着病人。

sentence: The manager assigned him to work on reception.
sentence_trans: 经理指派他去做接待工作。

sentence: He found his cousin to be anything but shy!
sentence_trans: 他发现他的表弟根本不是一个害羞的人!

sentence: The rocket was launched successfully.
sentence_trans: 火箭成功发射了。

sentence: The girl got information about the clothes from the catalogue.
sentence_trans: 小女孩能从产品目录中得到更多关于衣服的信息。

sentence: Your computer doesn't work? Did you switch it on?
sentence_trans: 你的电脑不能运行？你开电源了吗？

sentence: Plants generally take in water through their roots.
sentence_trans: 植物一般通过根部吸收水分。

sentence: The lady suffers from a toothache.
sentence_trans: 这个女士正遭受牙疼折磨。

sentence: Chopsticks would be the optimal choice to serve noodles.
sentence_trans: 筷子是吃面的最佳选择。

sentence: In order to drink the water, the crow dropped many stones into the bottle.
sentence_trans: 为了喝到水，这只乌鸦叼来了许多小石头放进瓶子里。

sentence: Because of the recession, we've had to cut down on our expenses.
sentence_trans: 因为不景气，我们已经不得不削减我们的开支。

sentence: She introduced herself in public.
sentence_trans: 她当众做了自我介绍。

mean_cn: phr. 走在前面，领先，干吧，干下去
sentence: The boy still went ahead with the race even after falling.
sentence_trans: 跌倒后，这个男孩仍继续比赛。

sentence: She opened the door and let out the dogs.
sentence_trans: 她打开了门，把狗放了出去。

sentence: An oil lamp burned in darkness.
sentence_trans: 一盏油灯在黑暗中发着光。

sentence: The girl is showing off her diamond ring.
sentence_trans: 那个女孩正在炫耀她的钻石戒指。

sentence: The mother cared for her daughter when she was sick.
sentence_trans: 妈妈在女儿生病的时候照顾她。

sentence: The little boy dressed himself up as a superhero.
sentence_trans: 小男孩把自己打扮成了一个超级英雄。

sentence: Prior to a date, girls usually take time to wash their hair.
sentence_trans: 女生们一般都会在约会前洗头。

sentence: The coach got credit for leading the team to victory.
sentence_trans: 教练因带领球队获得胜利而受到好评。

mean_cn: phr.对 ... 有怀疑，不能确定的
sentence: The judge is doubtful about raising which sign.
sentence_trans: 这位评委还不能确定举哪块牌子。

sentence: Debts are difficult to get rid of, so be careful with your money.
sentence_trans: 债务是很难清除的，所以小心你的钱。

sentence: She's pulling at her face.
sentence_trans: 她正在扯自己的脸。

sentence: He made a guess at the gift.
sentence_trans: 他猜了猜礼物是什么。

sentence: Only the owner can distinguish her dog from the other!
sentence_trans: 只有主人能把她的宠物狗和另一只狗区分开。

sentence: Although he didn't want to, his mother reasoned with him until he agreed to swim.
sentence_trans: 他不想去游泳，但他妈妈还是和他讲道理，直到他同意。

sentence: There is much more demand for ice-cream in summer than in winter.
sentence_trans: 人们在夏天对冰淇淋的需求比在冬天多得多。

sentence: The forest fire was completely out of control.
sentence_trans: 这场森林火灾彻底失控了。

sentence: The cat is holding on to the rope.
sentence_trans: 小猫正紧紧抓住绳子。

sentence: Although it's very noisy outside, she's absorbed in her book and didn't notice it.
sentence_trans: 虽然窗外很吵，但她完全专注于看书而没有注意到噪声。

sentence: They are two players shy of a full basketball team.
sentence_trans: 他们还差两名队员才能组成一支篮球队。

sentence: The large print makes for easier reading.
sentence_trans: 大号字体使阅读更容易。

sentence: He has to face up to his failure instead of running away from it.
sentence_trans: 他必须直面自己的失败而不是逃避。

sentence: The young boy came through his operation well, and soon learned to walk again.
sentence_trans: 这个小伙子术后恢复得很好，很快就又能走路了。

sentence: Money constraints prevented the boy travelling the world.
sentence_trans: 金钱的限制使这个男孩无法环游世界。

sentence: Despite his appearance, he is kind at heart.
sentence_trans: 不看他的外表，他本质上很和善。

sentence: She is very selective about the pearls used to make necklaces.
sentence_trans: 她对用于制作项链的珍珠很挑剔。

mean_cn: v. 侥幸躲过，勉强生活
sentence: He works hard all day, but he manages to get by.
sentence_trans: 他整日辛苦工作，也只能勉强生活。

sentence: The man successfully got across his meaning to the customer.
sentence_trans: 这个人成功地让客户理解了他的意思。

sentence: I could always rely on my dad when I was a little girl.
sentence_trans: 小时候我一直依靠着爸爸。

sentence: "Go and send for a doctor!" the emperor cried.
sentence_trans: “快去请太医！”皇上喊道。

sentence: I'm going to try out my new experiment on some mice.
sentence_trans: 我将在小白鼠身上试验我的新实验。

sentence: He dressed himself smartly so as to give a good impression to his blind date.
sentence_trans: 他精心打扮了一番，为的是给相亲对象留下好印象。

mean_cn: phr. 挂断电话，停止讲话
sentence: He ended the conversation angrily and rang off.
sentence_trans: 他生气地结束谈话，挂断了电话。

sentence: He rang up his friend on his cellphone.
sentence_trans: 他用手机给朋友打了个电话。

mean_cn: phr. 占据，占用，拿起，开始做，继续
sentence: This car takes up two parking spaces.
sentence_trans: 这辆车占了两个停车位。

sentence: I think 'impossible' looks better if we cut off the 'im-'.
sentence_trans: 我觉得把“impossible”这个单词的“im-”去掉更好。

mean_cn: phr. 接收，接管，接任，夺取
sentence: Workers are increasingly worried that robots will take over their jobs.
sentence_trans: 工人们越来越担心机器人会接替他们的工作。

sentence: Our department's four teams must integrate together to work on new projects.
sentence_trans: 我们部门的四个小组必须合力推进新项目。

sentence: Water is indispensable for the human body.
sentence_trans: 水对人体来说是必不可少的。

sentence: She's making an inquiry about the couple's house.
sentence_trans: 她正在询问关于这对夫妻的房子的事情。

sentence: Dry weather has an important effect on plants.
sentence_trans: 干旱天气对植物有重要影响。

sentence: An accident caused serious damage to the car.
sentence_trans: 一场车祸对这辆车造成了严重的损害。

sentence: They are taking action on the environmental problem.
sentence_trans: 他们正在对环境问题作出行动。

sentence: The note reminds me to play basketball at 9 o'clock.
sentence_trans: 这张便签提醒我在9点打篮球。

mean_cn: phr. 相同的，共有，有共同之处
sentence: The girl and boy are thinking in common.
sentence_trans: 女孩和男孩有相同的想法。

sentence: Our English teacher stressed on this correct usage.
sentence_trans: 我们的英语老师强调了这个正确用法。

sentence: My teddy bear belongs to me! Hands off!
sentence_trans: 泰迪熊是我的，你放手！

sentence: There's a huge obstacle to his career.
sentence_trans: 他的职业生涯面临巨大的障碍。

sentence: These two men's directions differ with each other.
sentence_trans: 这两个男人的方向各不相同。

sentence: Whether he can get to the restaurant on time is dependent on the traffic.
sentence_trans: 他能否准时到达餐厅取决于交通情况。

sentence: Her umbrella is protecting her from the sun.
sentence_trans: 她的伞在保护她不被太阳晒伤。

sentence: People can share with each other files using their mobile phones.
sentence_trans: 人们可以通过手机共享文件。

sentence: These two friends are both involved in organizing the tree planting event.
sentence_trans: 这两位朋友都参与了植树活动的组织工作。

sentence: His house is convenient for the subway station.
sentence_trans: 他的房子到地铁站很方便。

sentence: The law is applicable to everyone.
sentence_trans: 这部法律适用于所有人。

sentence: The boy learnt how to play basketball from his father.
sentence_trans: 小男孩从父亲那里学会了打篮球。

sentence: In the event of a fire, please use the fire extinguisher.
sentence_trans: 如果发生火灾，请用灭火器灭火。

sentence: He doesn't want any tea for the moment.
sentence_trans: 他现在暂时不想喝茶。

sentence: He thinks of the "Mona Lisa" as the best painting in the history of art.
sentence_trans: 他把《蒙娜丽莎》视为艺术史上最优秀的画作。

sentence: I had visitors come around to my place last night.
sentence_trans: 昨天晚上，一些客人来我家拜访。

sentence: Two points in this report are especially worthy of notice.
sentence_trans: 这份报告中有两点特别值得注意。

sentence: Jenny really takes after her mother in terms of looks.
sentence_trans: 珍妮长得很像她母亲。

sentence: She stepped up her training as the race came closer.
sentence_trans: 比赛临近时，她加快了训练。

sentence: After pulling down this old house, we can build a new one.
sentence_trans: 拆毁这幢老房子后，我们就可以建新的了。

sentence: The girl has her favorite T-shirt on.
sentence_trans: 女孩穿着她最喜欢的T恤。

sentence: The teacher asked them to sign their names and hand the form on.
sentence_trans: 老师让他们签名并把表格传下去。

sentence: The father is handing down the precious painting to his son.
sentence_trans: 父亲正把这幅珍贵的画传给自己的儿子。

sentence: Computers are very good at processing data.
sentence_trans: 计算机很擅长处理数据。

sentence: She was confident and outgoing—a perfect fit for this job.
sentence_trans: 她既自信又外向，非常适合这份工作。

sentence: She has cut back her studying hours recently.
sentence_trans: 她最近减少了学习时间。

sentence: The baby is already capable of feeding himself.
sentence_trans: 宝宝已经能够自己吃饭了。

sentence: A healthy balanced diet is beneficial to health.
sentence_trans: 平衡的膳食对身体健康有益。

sentence: At one time she made her own clothes.
sentence_trans: 曾经有段时间，她自己给自己做衣服穿。

sentence: He was a caring grandfather who always asked after his grandchildren.
sentence_trans: 他是一位慈爱的祖父，总是问候自己孙子孙女的健康。

mean_cn: phr. 对…感到羞耻，惭愧，难为情
sentence: He was ashamed of himself for getting the lowest score on the exam.
sentence_trans: 他因考试得了最低分而感到羞愧。

sentence: The clothing store offered substantial discounts on all items to boost sales.
sentence_trans: 这家服装店对店内所有的商品进行大幅度打折以促进销售。

sentence: The vase didn't break thanks to the young man catching it in time.
sentence_trans: 幸亏年轻人及时接住了，花瓶才没有打碎。

mean_cn: phr. 密切注视，当心，提防
sentence: Watch out for the banana skin!
sentence_trans: 小心踩到地上的香蕉皮！

mean_cn: phr. 谈到；开始（认识，理解）；提及；总计；苏醒；到达
sentence: When it comes to learning classical Chinese, I always feel dizzy.
sentence_trans: 一谈到文言文，我就晕。

sentence: My bicycle can speed up within a second!
sentence_trans: 我的自行车能在一秒内加快速度！

sentence: Help yourself to anything on the table.
sentence_trans: 桌上的东西请随便吃。

sentence: He points out a mistake in the book.
sentence_trans: 他指出书中的一个错误。

mean_cn: quant. 翻动，犁翻（土地），翻转
sentence: The green car turned over during the accident.
sentence_trans: 那辆绿色轿车在事故中翻车了。

sentence: "Why do I have to put on these clothes?" he asked. "I'm a bear."
sentence_trans: “为什么我要穿这些衣服？”它问，“我明明是一只熊啊！”

sentence: Maximize the volume if you still can't hear the sound clearly.
sentence_trans: 如果你还听不清声音，就把音量最大化。

sentence: He dropped out of school and found a job in order to help his family.
sentence_trans: 为了帮扶家里，他辍学去工作了。

sentence: The girl felt hatred for her colleague.
sentence_trans: 这个女生对她的同事怀有恨意。

sentence: He had to make a decision on which way to go.
sentence_trans: 他必须做出走哪条路的决定。

sentence: The two cars had a collision with each other.
sentence_trans: 这两辆汽车与彼此发生了碰撞。

sentence: I made an investment in property.
sentence_trans: 我投资了房产。

sentence: They resolved their dispute about the land.
sentence_trans: 他们解决了关于土地的纠纷。

sentence: Water always flows downhill, without question.
sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，水总是往低处流。

sentence: As a professional, he is very familiar with the whole process.

sentence: He has some doubts about the new employee is the right person for the job.

mean_cn: n. 铁路；  v. 迫使某人做某事

sentence_trans: 她觉得她能与故事里的角色产生共鸣。

sentence: We discussed everything— when to go, what to see and so forth.
sentence_trans: 我们讨论了全部细节-什么时候走，去看什么等等。

sentence: His parents leave him alone to concentrate on his study.
sentence_trans: 父母不打扰他，让他独自专心学习。

sentence: This orange has been cut in half.
sentence_trans: 这个橘子被切成了两半。

sentence: Her grandfather still plays tennis now and then.
sentence_trans: 她的祖父仍然时不时地去打网球。

sentence: The meeting is about to begin.
sentence_trans: 会议即将召开。

sentence: The school bus arrives at school at 8am every day.
sentence_trans: 校车每天早上8点到校。

sentence: All of a sudden, a cat jumped out and surprised him.
sentence_trans: 一只猫突然跳出来，吓了他一跳。

sentence: She adhered to a strict study timetable in the months before her exams.
sentence_trans: 考试前几个月她都坚持一个严格的学习时间表。

sentence: His grandfather can scarcely hear his grandson speaking.
sentence_trans: 他祖父听力不好，几乎听不到他孙子说的话。

sentence: The hospital aims to provide a caring environment.
sentence_trans: 这家医院以提供充满关怀的环境为目标。

sentence: In addition to taking care of her baby, she also has to work.
sentence_trans: 除了照顾孩子以外，她还要工作。

sentence: He is about to switch off the light.
sentence_trans: 他正要把灯关了。

sentence: He is just a little dog after all, so stop blaming him.
sentence_trans: 别再骂它了，毕竟它只是个小狗啊。

mean_cn: phr. 保留，阻止，阻挡，隐瞒
sentence: They kept back fruit and drinks for the movies.
sentence_trans: 他们留了水果和饮料看电影时享用。

sentence: She is going to travel by air to the United States.
sentence_trans: 她正准备乘飞机去美国旅行。

sentence: As a result of eating too much fast food, I got really fat.
sentence_trans: 由于吃了太多快餐食品，结果我变得非常胖。

sentence: The girl has given up doing her homework on the laptop.
sentence_trans: 那个女生放弃用电脑做作业了。

sentence: She felt grateful to the girl for the food.
sentence_trans: 她就这些食物对女孩表示感激。

sentence: Cutting up vegetables is the preparation for cooking.
sentence_trans: 切菜是做饭的准备工作。

sentence: The statue is a memorial to Kongzi.
sentence_trans: 这是一座孔子的纪念雕像。

sentence: There's a strong connection between food and health.
sentence_trans: 食物和健康之间有着强烈的联系。

sentence: The man throws away the can.
sentence_trans: 那个男人扔掉易拉罐。

sentence: Both of these shoes are totally worn out.
sentence_trans: 这双鞋被完全磨坏了。

sentence: The couple is drawing up a list of furniture they need for their new house.
sentence_trans: 这对夫妇正在草拟一份他们的新房子所需家具的清单。

sentence: The driver has stopped to give way to the chickens.
sentence_trans: 司机停下车，给小鸡们让路。

sentence: He kept in mind that his mother had asked him to go home early.
sentence_trans: 妈妈曾要他早点回家，对此他一直牢记于心。

sentence: A farmer discovered an antique vase totally by chance.
sentence_trans: 一位农民偶然发现了一个古董花瓶。

sentence: Playing videos aloud on the subway is permitted, although it's frowned upon by other passengers.
sentence_trans: 在地铁上大声外放视频未被禁止，尽管其他乘客都为之皱眉。

sentence: His toothache arose from eating too many sweets.
sentence_trans: 他的牙疼是由吃太多甜食引起的。

sentence: He ruled out flying on the grounds of it being too expensive.
sentence_trans: 因为费用太高的原因，他排除了坐飞机这一选项。

sentence: The moving film left her in tears.
sentence_trans: 这部动人的电影让她流泪。

sentence: This traffic's terrible. At this rate he'll never get to the airport on time.
sentence_trans: 交通太糟糕了。照这样下去，他根本不可能准时到达机场。

sentence: She can sympathize with him because she knows what it's like to have a headache.
sentence_trans: 她对他表示同情，因为她知道头痛是什么感觉。

sentence: He set his schoolbag down on the sofa and turned on the TV.
sentence_trans: 他把书包放在沙发上，并打开了电视。

sentence: This restaurant provides us with free juice.
sentence_trans: 这家餐厅提供免费果汁。

sentence: Although he was naughty in mall, his dad let him off this time.
sentence_trans: 虽然他在商场里很闹腾，但他的爸爸这次没有生气。

sentence: He was in such a hurry leaving the house that he left his phone behind.
sentence_trans: 他急匆匆地出门，把手机忘在了家里。

sentence: The dog ran to the door at once when the doorbell rang.
sentence_trans: 门铃一响，小狗就立刻跑向门口。

sentence: He is trying to justify his rude behavior.
sentence_trans: 他正试图为自己粗鲁的行为辩解。

sentence: Sweet food can result in teeth problems.
sentence_trans: 甜食会损害牙齿。

sentence: The direction that the one duck is facing differs from the others.
sentence_trans: 那只鸭子所面对的方位和其他的鸭子不同。

sentence: This couple wish for a baby, so they both make wishes on falling stars.
sentence_trans: 这对夫妻想要有个孩子，所以他们都在对着流星许愿。

sentence: Doing sports gives rise to a slim figure.
sentence_trans: 运动让身材苗条。

sentence: The freshly baked cake looks very appetizing to the girl!
sentence_trans: 新鲜出炉的蛋糕对这个女孩来说看着十分可口！

sentence: The soldiers are walking in step with each other.
sentence_trans: 士兵们正步伐一致地行走。

sentence: She showed her objection to the other teacher's words.
sentence_trans: 她对另外一位老师的话表示反对。

sentence: There's a contradiction between his hands.
sentence_trans: 他的双手之间互相矛盾。

sentence: Cars are limited to 60 km/h on this road.
sentence_trans: 此路段的车速限制为每小时60公里。

sentence: The two girls are trying on dresses.
sentence_trans: 这两个女孩正在试裙子。

sentence: The workers are hired to deal with the garbage.
sentence_trans: 工人们被请来处理这些垃圾。

sentence: Although his mother told him not to, he couldn't help but eat the whole cake!
sentence_trans: 尽管他妈妈告诉他不能这么做，他还是忍不住把整个蛋糕吃光了。

sentence: Lying in the hospital, he has anxiety for himself.
sentence_trans: 躺在医院里，他为自己感到担忧。

sentence: It's a long letter but, in brief, he says no.
sentence_trans: 这是一封长信，但简而言之，他拒绝了。

mean_cn: phr. 是……的典型，是...的特征
sentence: Serving food on a banana leaf is typical of Indian cuisine.
sentence_trans: 用香蕉叶盛食物是典型的印度菜风格。

sentence: He finally finished painting the wall once and for all.
sentence_trans: 他最终还是一次性刷完了这面墙。

sentence: Interference with my sleep leaves me in a bad mood.
sentence_trans: 睡眠被干扰让我觉得很不爽。

sentence: The new machines help to produce products on a large scale.
sentence_trans: 新机器有助于大规模生产产品。

sentence: He persisted in training for many years despite his disability, and eventually won the competition!
sentence_trans: 尽管身体残疾，他仍坚持训练多年，最终赢得了比赛！

sentence: Her collection of medals convinced him of her outstanding ability.
sentence_trans: 她获得的奖牌使他相信其杰出的能力。

sentence: The flight was called off because of bad weather.
sentence_trans: 航班因恶劣天气而被取消了。

sentence: Earthquakes, in some instances, can be devastating, whereas in others they might be quite mild.
sentence_trans: 地震在一些情况下是毁灭性的，但在另一些情况下则影响较小。

sentence: The little boy is searching for his toy car.
sentence_trans: 小男孩正在寻找他的玩具车。

sentence: At present I'm free, but I have a meeting in ten minutes.
sentence_trans: 目前我有空，但十分钟后有个会议。

sentence: He thinks he's so fit, as a matter of fact, he's pretty fat.
sentence_trans: 他觉得自己身材很好，事实上，他挺胖的。

sentence: His school is close enough to home that he can get there on foot.
sentence_trans: 他的学校离家很近，所以他可以步行去。

sentence: She is going to call up her boss.
sentence_trans: 她正准备给她老板打电话。

sentence: His colleagues backed him up when he needed help.
sentence_trans: 当他需要帮助时，同事们都来支援他。

sentence: He's qualified to be a doctor.
sentence_trans: 他有成为一名医生的资格。

sentence: The suit provides protection for him; he won't get infected.
sentence_trans: 这身衣服给他提供保护，这样他不会感染病毒。

sentence: The red team was the opponent of the white side.
sentence_trans: 红队是白队的对手。

sentence: He made a contribution to helping the poor.
sentence_trans: 他对帮助穷人做出了贡献。

sentence: His father agreed to his request for a Superman costume.
sentence_trans: 他父亲同意了他想要一套超人服装的请求。

sentence: You'd better dispose of these used tissues in the garbage.
sentence_trans: 你最好将这些用过的纸扔到垃圾桶里。

mean_cn: n. 营养物；  adj. 营养的
sentence: Apples contain many healthy nutrients for the body.
sentence_trans: 苹果含有许多有益身体健康的营养成分。

sentence: The awful weather may account for the lack of customers in the restaurant today.
sentence_trans: 天气不好或许能说明今天这家餐馆人少的原因。

sentence: She is suspicious of his motives for suddenly being so nice to her.
sentence_trans: 他突然对她特别好，这不禁让她怀疑其动机。

sentence: For this dish, fresh herbs are preferable to garlic.
sentence_trans: 做这道菜，用新鲜香草比大蒜更好。

sentence: Even the most gentle and easygoing man may, at times, get angry.
sentence_trans: 即使是最温柔随和的人，有时也会发火。

mean_cn: phr. 保护，使免受...(侵害等)的
sentence: Their house is secure from the flood.
sentence_trans: 他们的房子不会被洪水所淹。

sentence: The driver deviated from the route on the map.
sentence_trans: 司机偏离了地图上的路线。

sentence: As the finance manager, she has the control over the budget.
sentence_trans: 作为财务经理，她控制着预算。

sentence: Many people are on parade to appeal for government changes.
sentence_trans: 很多人上街游行来要求政府作出改变。

sentence: Access to the building is by card only.
sentence_trans: 只有用磁卡才能进入这栋楼。

sentence: The movie originates from a popular children's book.
sentence_trans: 这部电影源于一本很受欢迎的儿童读物。

sentence: The little boy put his concentration on the music.
sentence_trans: 小男孩把注意力集中于音乐上。

sentence: In the light of the school rules, you can't smoke.
sentence_trans: 根据校规，你不能抽烟。

sentence: He finished the test early and turned it in to the teacher.
sentence_trans: 他很早就完成了试卷并交给了老师。

sentence: The customer is complaining that the products are inferior in quality to the samples.
sentence_trans: 顾客在抱怨产品的质量不如样品。

mean_cn: phr. 对...极其重要的，必不可少的
sentence: Sunlight is essential to the healthy growth of most plants.
sentence_trans: 太阳光对大部分植物的健康生长至关重要。

sentence: Contrary to popular belief, many cats don't like milk.
sentence_trans: 与普遍观点相反，很多猫不喜欢牛奶。

sentence: The lifeguard brought the drowned man to.
sentence_trans: 救生员让溺水者恢复了意识。

sentence: He was blind to the fire beside his bed.
sentence_trans: 他对床边的火毫无察觉。

sentence: As regards this book, his father spoke highly of it.
sentence_trans: 关于这本书，他爸爸对其给予了很高评价。

sentence: The video-sharing website offers a paid service, which allows users to skip ads.
sentence_trans: 这家视频分享网站提供付费服务，允许用户跳过广告。

sentence: The business partners met with each other this morning.
sentence_trans: 双方商业伙伴于今天早上举行了会谈。

sentence: The speaker is talking in detail about his company.
sentence_trans: 演讲者在详细地介绍他的公司。

sentence: The fire burnt out before reaching the end of the match.
sentence_trans: 火还没烧到火柴的底部就燃尽了。

sentence: We hated it when there was interference in our chess games!
sentence_trans: 我们讨厌在下象棋的时候被人干涉！

sentence: A week later, the student adjusted to the life in the new school.
sentence_trans: 一星期后，这个学生适应了新学校。

sentence: I like eating fruits, and apple in particular.
sentence_trans: 我喜欢吃水果，尤其是苹果。

sentence: The big, heavy phone is out of date.
sentence_trans: 又大又笨重的手机已经过时了。

sentence: I got sick because of the cold and the rain.
sentence_trans: 因为天冷和这场雨，我生病了。

sentence: In general swans are white, but there are some black swans.
sentence_trans: 天鹅通常是白色的，但也有黑色的天鹅存在。

sentence: In a word, this TV series is terrible.
sentence_trans: 总之，这部剧很烂。

sentence: As usual, he went to the coffee shop to buy his coffee.
sentence_trans: 和往常一样，他去咖啡店买了一杯咖啡。

sentence: The dinosaurs died out about 65 million years ago.
sentence_trans: 恐龙在约6500万年前灭绝了。

sentence: The power plant is responsible for the provision of power.
sentence_trans: 电厂负责提供电力。

sentence: Wheels gave the snail an advantage over everyone else in the race.
sentence_trans: 轮子让这只蜗牛在赛跑中比其他蜗牛占优势。

sentence: She has been out of touch with her friend for years.
sentence_trans: 她和朋友已经多年没有联系了。

sentence: Strength training is helpful to your muscle growth.
sentence_trans: 力量训练有助于肌肉生长。

sentence: He's sick and tired of his work.
sentence_trans: 他厌倦了他的工作。

sentence: He's crazy for some fried chicken right now.
sentence_trans: 他现在很想吃点炸鸡。

sentence: He has a few questions with regard to the dance competition on the poster.
sentence_trans: 关于海报上的那个舞蹈比赛，他有几个问题。

sentence: This man specializes in carpentry. He can make 10 wooden chairs a day.
sentence_trans: 他专攻木工手艺，一天可以制作10把椅子。

sentence: The scheduled flight time was set back a few hours due to the heavy fog.
sentence_trans: 由于大雾，原定的飞行时间推迟了几个小时。

sentence: In the absence of her husband, she was quite busy at home.
sentence_trans: 在丈夫不在场的情况下，她在家里非常忙。

sentence: He lost a lot of money in consequence of the stock market crash.
sentence_trans: 由于股市崩盘，他损失了很多钱。

sentence: His vacation plans fell through because of the forest fire.
sentence_trans: 他的度假计划因为森林火灾而泡汤了。

sentence: The number of seats should correspond to the number of guests.
sentence_trans: 座位的数量应与客人的人数相符。

sentence: This apple tree always brings forth lots of fruit.
sentence_trans: 这棵苹果树总是结出很多果实。

sentence: The TV ad showed a promotion for a sale at the book store.
sentence_trans: 电视广告宣传了书店大减价活动。

sentence: The locker key deposit is refundable.
sentence_trans: 储物柜钥匙的押金是可以退还的。

sentence: According to research, kids can only focus for 20 minutes at most on one classroom task.
sentence_trans: 根据研究，小孩子最多能在一节课上集中注意力20分钟。

sentence: Many people are attached to their mobile phones and can't live without them.
sentence_trans: 许多人被手机束缚住，不能离开手机生活。

mean_cn: phr.与……常在一起，和……联想在一起
sentence: They are best friends and always associate with each other.
sentence_trans: 她们是最好的朋友，总是黏在一起。

sentence: She hands the key over to me.
sentence_trans: 她把钥匙递给我。

sentence: We got on the bus in turn.
sentence_trans: 我们依次上公交车。

sentence: The snow globe reminded her of Christmas!
sentence_trans: 这个雪球使她想起了圣诞节！

sentence: I approve of your plan.
sentence_trans: 我赞成你的计划。

sentence: He won the fight by knocking out his opponent.
sentence_trans: 他击倒了对手，赢得了这场拳击赛。

mean_cn: phr. 突然发生，突然……起来
sentence: The cat burst out laughing.
sentence_trans: 喵星人突然大笑起来。

sentence: He was a great boyfriend. In addition, he knew first aid.
sentence_trans: 除了做一个优秀的男朋友，他还知道急救知识。

sentence: The woman set about cleaning the house.
sentence_trans: 她准备开始打扫房子了。

sentence: The girl is in favor of taking exams with honesty.
sentence_trans: 这个小女孩支持诚信考试。

mean_cn: phr. 省出（时间、金钱），放置一边
sentence: He sets aside money every month.
sentence_trans: 他每个月都会省出一笔钱。

sentence: The surgery is under way, please wait patiently.
sentence_trans: 手术正在进行中，请耐心等候。

sentence: It looks like my car will be in place for a while.
sentence_trans: 看起来我的车得呆在那一段时间了。

sentence: The student on duty has to clean the blackboard and the desk.
sentence_trans: 值日生必须擦黑板和整理讲台。

sentence: Thankfully the operation went all right.
sentence_trans: 谢天谢地，手术进行得很顺利。

sentence: The two brothers tried to cover up the accident from their mother.
sentence_trans: 这俩兄弟试着从妈妈那里掩盖这件事。

sentence: She's skilful at drawing.
sentence_trans: 她擅长绘画。

sentence: These pills are supplements to natural vitamins.
sentence_trans: 这些药丸是对天然维生素的补充。

sentence: The ratio of boys to girls is 3 to 2.
sentence_trans: 男生和女生的比例是3比2。

sentence: He shows more patience with his talkative friends than other people.
sentence_trans: 与其他人相比，他对他的话唠朋友更有耐心。

sentence: The busy cashier told the customer she'd be with her in a moment.
sentence_trans: 忙碌的收银员告诉顾客稍等，她马上就来。

sentence: Fans were already crowding outside, eager for the show.
sentence_trans: 粉丝们早已挤在外面，迫不及待想看演出。

sentence: Our parents provided for us when we were young.
sentence_trans: 我们的父母在我们小时候供养我们。

sentence: The air conditioner was on, but he was sweating all the same.
sentence_trans: 空调开了，但他仍然浑身冒汗。

sentence: I need to count up how much money I have spent today.
sentence_trans: 我需要算一下我今天花了多少钱。

sentence: It is out of the question for him to finish his work tonight.
sentence_trans: 他今天晚上不可能完成手头上的工作。

sentence: The couple used to correspond with each other.
sentence_trans: 这对夫妇过去常常互相通信。

mean_cn: phr. （对某人）有吸引力，（使某人）感兴趣
sentence: The cake appeals to the little girl because of its bright colors and delicious smell.
sentence_trans: 蛋糕颜色鲜艳、香味诱人，吸引了这个小女孩。

sentence: The thief was arrested for breaking into a car.
sentence_trans: 这个小偷因橇车而被捕。

mean_cn: v. 解雇；停止活动；  n. （临时）解雇期
sentence: I'm afraid your work hasn't been very good, so I have to lay you off.
sentence_trans: 我恐怕你的工作不是很好，所以我不得不解雇你。

sentence: The man's punch managed to break through the wall.
sentence_trans: 这个男人的拳头成功打破了这面墙。

sentence: The food in the fridge is sufficient for us to eat.
sentence_trans: 冰箱里的食物足够我们吃了。

sentence: She has sympathy with her colleague's idea.
sentence_trans: 她赞同同事的主意。

sentence: Carving a watermelon needs regard for details.
sentence_trans: 雕刻西瓜需要对细节的尊重。

sentence: This is a beautiful china teacup and teapot.
sentence_trans: 这是一套精美的青花瓷茶杯与茶壶。

sentence: He apologised and took full responsibility for the accident.
sentence_trans: 他道了歉并主动承担事故的全部责任。

sentence: On one hand, she'd love a dog; on the other hand, she's allergic to them.
sentence_trans: 一方面，她很想要一只狗；另一方面，她对狗过敏。

mean_cn: n. 对 ... 的审美能力
sentence: His taste in clothes differs from that of his friend.
sentence_trans: 他和他朋友的服装品味不同。

mean_cn: adj. 受到影响的，受（疾病）侵袭的
sentence: They were really affected by the movie.
sentence_trans: 他们确实被电影感动了。

sentence: There are a lot of goods on board the ship.
sentence_trans: 船上有很多货物。

mean_cn: adj.景色优美的；舞台背景的，舞台的；  n.风景名胜
sentence: These scenic islands are the perfect place to go traveling.
sentence_trans: 这些景色优美的岛屿是旅行的绝佳地点。

sentence: He was selected by the company from the group of applicants.
sentence_trans: 他是公司从一群求职者中挑选出来的。

sentence: The secretary informed everyone of the time of the meeting.
sentence_trans: 秘书通知了大家会议的时间。

mean_cn: phr. 绝不，无论怎样也不
sentence: The president insisted that in no way did he advocate war.
sentence_trans: 总统坚称他绝不主张战争。

sentence: The reading on the thermometer varies with the temperature.
sentence_trans: 温度计上的读数随气温而变化。

sentence: A healthy family environment will have a positive influence on any child.
sentence_trans: 健康的家庭环境会对孩子有积极的影响。

sentence: In a departure from his usual choice, he ordered rice this time!
sentence_trans: 不同于以往的选择，这次他点了米饭！

sentence: Hydrogen combines with oxygen to form water.
sentence_trans: 氢气和氧气结合形成水。

sentence: He tunes in to this show every week.
sentence_trans: 他每周都收看这个节目。

sentence: Newspapers keep people up to date with the latest news.
sentence_trans: 报纸能让人们了解到最近的新闻。

sentence: He trusts in his ability to shoot the apple.
sentence_trans: 他相信他的能力足以射中苹果。

sentence: When the singer's fiancee showed up on stage, the audience was surprised.
sentence_trans: 当这这名歌手的未婚妻出现在舞台上时，观众感到很惊讶。

sentence: A lot of people's favorite summer activities seem to relate to water.
sentence_trans: 许多人最喜欢的夏日活动似乎都和水有关。

sentence: In accordance with his wishes, he was buried by the river.
sentence_trans: 遵照他的遗愿，人们把他安葬在了河边。

sentence: In a sense, the internet has shrunk the world.
sentence_trans: 从某种意义上讲，互联网把世界缩小了。

sentence: She glanced at her watch.
sentence_trans: 她匆匆瞥了一眼自己的手表。

sentence: The concept of geometry seemed foreign to them.
sentence_trans: 几何的概念对于他们来说太陌生了。

sentence: Divide eight by two, and we'll get four.
sentence_trans: 八除以二，就得到四。

sentence: She found it difficult to conceive of him as a professional chef!
sentence_trans: 她难以想象他竟然是一个专业厨师！

sentence: The sisters shared a secret and burst into laughter.
sentence_trans: 这对小姐妹分享了一个秘密然后突然开始大笑。

sentence: Once she became aware of the smell, she immediately turned off the oven.
sentence_trans: 她一意识到这股气味，就立刻关掉了烤箱。

sentence: He usually exercises at home.
sentence_trans: 他一般在家里做锻炼。

sentence: The little boy refers to the tent in his room as his secret place.
sentence_trans: 小男孩把他房间里的帐篷称为他的秘密基地。

sentence: The endless work means she has used up all her energy.
sentence_trans: 她已经被干不完的活耗去了所有力气。

sentence: Add some sugar to your coffee to make it sweeter.
sentence_trans: 给你的咖啡加点糖让它更甜。

sentence: I named this boat in memory of my wife.
sentence_trans: 为纪念我的妻子，我以她的名字命名了这条船。

sentence: She heard of a car accident that happened on the street.
sentence_trans: 她听说街上发生了一起车祸。

sentence: The man handed out the advertising leaflet to the passerby on the street.
sentence_trans: 那个男人在街上向路人发广告传单。

sentence: We took this picture of ourselves.
sentence_trans: 我们给自己拍了这张照片。

sentence: Can I check in online? And by the way, what's the WIFI password?
sentence_trans: 我可以网上办理入住吗？顺便问一下，无线网密码是多少呢？

sentence: This man must answer for his careless driving.
sentence_trans: 这个男人必须为自己的粗心驾驶负责。

sentence: Dough is a mixture of flour and water.
sentence_trans: 生面团是面粉和水的混合物。

sentence: He said, "Above all, we should focus on the volume of the cup."
sentence_trans: 他说：“首先，我们应该关注杯子的容量。”

sentence: I have completely run out of money, but I don't remember how.
sentence_trans: 我把钱花光了，但完全不记得是怎么用完的了。

sentence: The things on this bill added up to 250 yuan.
sentence_trans: 这张账单上的东西加起来正好250块。

mean_cn: adj. 不健康的，对健康有害的
sentence: It is unhealthy to stay up late, smoke cigarettes and drink alcohol.
sentence_trans: 熬夜、抽烟、酗酒都是不健康的。

mean_cn: phr. 放好；把…收起来；储存
sentence: He finally made the bed and put away the clothes.
sentence_trans: 他终于整理了床铺、放好了衣服。

sentence: She cannot hear things clearly due to her old age.
sentence_trans: 由于年岁过高，她的耳朵听不太清。

sentence: The girl is very satisfied with the pizza.
sentence_trans: 这个女孩对披萨很满意。

sentence: There must have been a mix up, I didn't order this.
sentence_trans: 这肯定是弄混了，我没有订这个。

sentence: Electricity may be a hazard to children.
sentence_trans: 电对于儿童或许是一种危险。

sentence: The difference between these two apples is color.
sentence_trans: 这两个苹果之间的差别在于颜色。

sentence: The soccer player has confidence in himself.
sentence_trans: 这位足球运动员对自己有信心。

sentence: He paced back and forth outside the ward where his wife was giving birth.
sentence_trans: 他在妻子的产房外来回踱步。

sentence: Smoking is a danger to health.
sentence_trans: 吸烟危害健康。

mean_cn: n. ...的入口，进入权，（某行业、大学、社团等的）进入许可
sentence: The reporter gained entrance to the hotel by pretending to be a cleaner.
sentence_trans: 记者装扮成清洁工从而进入酒店。

sentence: Many colleagues spoke highly of her working abilities.
sentence_trans: 许多同事都高度赞扬她的工作能力。

sentence: The car in the garage is at my disposal.
sentence_trans: 车库里的车任由我使用。

sentence: How can I cope with all this dirty laundry?
sentence_trans: 我该怎么应付这堆脏衣服呢？

sentence: He has already seen through the magician's trick.
sentence_trans: 他早已看穿魔术师的把戏。

sentence: They struggled to keep up with the race leader.
sentence_trans: 他们努力想跟上赛跑的领头者。

sentence: They waved and promised to keep in touch.
sentence_trans: 她们挥手告别，许诺将保持联系。

sentence: "Hold on to me!" I won't leave you alone at any rate.
sentence_trans: “抓紧我！”无论如何我都不会丢下你不管的。

sentence: I can take up to four people in my car.
sentence_trans: 我的汽车最多能坐四个人。

sentence: The man sells tomatoes, bananas, apples, and so on.
sentence_trans: 这个小贩卖的有番茄、香蕉、苹果等等。

sentence: He can really do many tasks all at once.
sentence_trans: 他真的可以同时做很多事情。

sentence: The man in the suit is in charge of this metal factory.
sentence_trans: 穿西装的男人主管这个金属加工厂。

mean_cn: phr.在打折，廉价出售；待售的；拍卖的
sentence: All the shoes are on sale today.
sentence_trans: 今天所有的鞋子都在打折。

sentence: I don't have to worry about my things because my dog is on guard.
sentence_trans: 我不用担心我的东西，因为有我的狗在站岗。

sentence: His friend's encouraging words really cheered him up.
sentence_trans: 朋友鼓励的话让他振作了起来。

sentence: It's 2012 right now, but before long it'll be 2013.
sentence_trans: 现在是2012，不久以后将是2013。

sentence: She worries about her final exam.
sentence_trans: 她为期末考试而担忧。

sentence: She is watching an online class and taking down some notes.
sentence_trans: 她边看网课边记笔记。

sentence: He is keen on starting his new job, having been unemployed for so long.
sentence_trans: 他失业了很长时间，所以对新工作充满热情。

sentence: When he is sad, he has a tendency to smoking.
sentence_trans: 当他伤心时，他有想抽烟的倾向。

sentence: The resistance to viruses is better in a healthy body.
sentence_trans: 健康身体对病毒的抵抗力更强。

sentence: She chose a larger size, allowing for shrinking when the dress was washed.
sentence_trans: 考虑到这条裙子洗时会缩水，她就选了大一号的尺码。

sentence: She has envy of their love.
sentence_trans: 她嫉妒他们的爱情。

sentence: He sided with the workers who asked for better helmets.
sentence_trans: 他支持那些要求更好头盔的工人们。

sentence: He has fully recovered from the virus.
sentence_trans: 他已经彻底从病毒感染中康复了。

sentence: He cooks dinner himself every once in a while.
sentence_trans: 他偶尔会自己下厨。

sentence: He'll go to the party on the condition that his friend wears those funny trousers.
sentence_trans: 如果他的朋友穿上那条搞笑的裤子，他就会参加派对。

mean_cn: phr. 逐渐消失，磨灭，损耗
sentence: He's feeling sick again because the drugs are wearing off.
sentence_trans: 他因为药效消失而又感觉不舒服。

sentence: Cutting out junk food will help you lose weight.
sentence_trans: 停止吃垃圾食物会让你瘦下来。

sentence: The strong wind last night brought down the telephone pole.
sentence_trans: 昨晚的强风把电线杆吹倒了。

sentence: To test the side effect of this fertilizer, we put it into use on a small scale.
sentence_trans: 为了测试这种化肥的副作用，我们小规模地使用了它。

sentence: The baby girl is coming up to her father.
sentence_trans: 小女孩正在朝着他的父亲走来。

sentence: In spite of the rain, the boys made it to school on time.
sentence_trans: 尽管下雨了，那些学生依然准时到了学校上课。

sentence: The man is giving a comment about the game.
sentence_trans: 这人正在对这场比赛发表看法。

sentence: Monkeys have some characteristics of humans.
sentence_trans: 猴子有一些人类的特征。

sentence: Cattle feed on grass.
sentence_trans: 牛以草为食。

sentence: There's a decrease in my piggy bank savings.
sentence_trans: 我的小猪存钱罐里的存款正在减少。

mean_cn: n. 着重于，强调；重读，重音
sentence: This housekeeping manager puts special emphasis on neatness.
sentence_trans: 这位家政经理特别强调整洁。

sentence: She reacted to the food and felt terrible.
sentence_trans: 她对这盘食物起了反应，感觉很难受。

sentence: In his paper, he made reference to existing research from the field.
sentence_trans: 他在论文中参考了该领域现有的研究成果。

sentence: He would only get a D at best if he kept skipping class.
sentence_trans: 如果他继续翘课的话，他最多只能得一个D。

sentence: He ran away with the championship this year.
sentence_trans: 他轻松赢得了今年的冠军。

sentence: The businesswoman is consulting with the expert about whether to enter this market.
sentence_trans: 女商人正在和专家商量是否进入这个市场。

sentence: The fireplace gives off lots of heat to keep their feet warm.
sentence_trans: 壁炉散发的热量让他们的脚都温暖起来。

sentence: All participants are willing to participate in the meeting discussion.
sentence_trans: 所有与会者都积极参与会议讨论。

sentence: Suddenly the car was out of control and ran into the wall.
sentence_trans: 突然间他的车失控了，撞到了墙上。

sentence: I couldn't make out the answer to this math problem.
sentence_trans: 我不知道怎么解答这道数学题。

sentence: The student is applying for membership of the University Guitar Society.
sentence_trans: 这个学生正在申请加入大学吉他社。

sentence: Her day usually begins with a cup of coffee.
sentence_trans: 她的一天通常是从一杯咖啡开始的。

sentence: There's an island in the distance.
sentence_trans: 远处有一座岛。

sentence: He offered them some food in return for giving him a lift.
sentence_trans: 他给了他们一些食物，作为让他搭便车的回报。

sentence: It's common to get fat.
sentence_trans: 长胖很常见。

sentence: A balanced diet and exercise contributed to her good figure.
sentence_trans: 均衡的饮食和锻炼有助于她塑造一个好身材。

sentence: There has been a clear improvement in the patient's condition.
sentence_trans: 这位病人的情况有了明显的改善。

sentence: He exposed himself to the virus by not wearing a face mask.
sentence_trans: 他没有戴口罩，因而让自己暴露在病毒环境中。

sentence: Whether he had fun or not is beside the point—he promised to be home by 8pm!
sentence_trans: 他是否玩得开心并不重要——他承诺了晚上8点到家的！

sentence: They are tying to let young people know that politics is relevant to them too!
sentence_trans: 他们想让年轻人知道政治也与他们密切相关！

sentence: I need to think over whether this plan could be implemented.
sentence_trans: 我要仔细考虑下这个计划能否实行。

sentence: He was sent off by the referee.
sentence_trans: 他被裁判罚下场了。

mean_cn: phr.（在别无办法的情况下）诉诸，采用
sentence: When his cousin didn't answer his call, he resorted to going round to her house.
sentence_trans: 他的表妹不接电话，他只好到她家去了。

sentence: The match was put over to the next week due to the storm.
sentence_trans: 由于暴风雨，比赛推迟到下周举行。

sentence: This little boy was trying to get at the apple on the table.
sentence_trans: 小男孩努力想够到桌上的苹果。

sentence: The doctor agreed to discharge her from the hospital.
sentence_trans: 医生同意让她出院。

mean_cn: phr.检查（以确保一切正常）；核实，调查
sentence: He checked on his child twice during the night.
sentence_trans: 他夜里起来检查了孩子两次。

sentence: This beautiful building is home to the municipal government of San Francisco.
sentence_trans: 这个漂亮的建筑是旧金山市政府所在地。

mean_cn: phr. 坚持，遵守，粘附在…上，紧跟，紧随
sentence: This blogger always sticks to the same format when posting online.
sentence_trans: 这个博主一直很坚持自己的发博风格。

sentence: He is using his camera to focus on the flower to be photographed.
sentence_trans: 他正在以这朵花为焦点进行拍摄。

sentence: My boss is always critical of my work.
sentence_trans: 我的老板总是对我的工作很挑剔。

sentence: Trapped under the collapsed house, he depends on the chocolate to survive.
sentence_trans: 他被困在倒塌的房子下面，靠着这块巧克力维持生命。

sentence: She converted her euro to American dollars.
sentence_trans: 她把欧元兑换成了美元。

sentence: Mr Milk, a representative of the Drinks Group, is giving a speech at the food conference.
sentence_trans: 牛奶先生是饮料集团的代表，他在食品大会上发表演讲。

sentence: People are required to take their insurance card with them when registering with a doctor.
sentence_trans: 人们必须带上保险卡，才能在医生处注册登记。

sentence: I am responsible for the safety of this plane.
sentence_trans: 我对这架飞机的安全负责。

sentence: He conducted detailed research on insects.
sentence_trans: 他对昆虫进行了详细的研究。

sentence: She wondered what on earth her roommate was making.
sentence_trans: 她想知道她的室友到底在做什么。

sentence: The boy can lift them, but his friend cannot.
sentence_trans: 这个男孩能举起它们，但他的朋友不能。

sentence: I brought an umbrella in case of rain.
sentence_trans: 我带了一把伞，以防下雨。

sentence: The red tulip makes a strong contrast with the other yellow tulips around it.
sentence_trans: 这只红色郁金香与周围的黄色郁金香形成了鲜明对比。

mean_cn: v.拔出，离开，度过难关，恢复健康
sentence: After the battle the troops pulled out by helicopter.
sentence_trans: 交战后，部队坐直升机撤退了。

mean_cn: phr. 为纪念，为庆祝，向…表示敬意
sentence: He wears the bullet in honour of his fallen comrades.
sentence_trans: 他戴着子弹是为了纪念牺牲的战友们。

sentence: He's generous with money, always helping the poor.
sentence_trans: 他在金钱方面很大方，一直帮助穷人。

sentence: The football player committed the foul on purpose to prevent the goal from being scored.
sentence_trans: 这个球员故意犯规防止对方进球得分。

sentence: Because of exposure to the sun, Mr. corn is burnt.
sentence_trans: 因为暴露在太阳下，玉米先生都晒伤了。

sentence: The judge ruled that he was innocent of any crime.
sentence_trans: 法官判定他没有犯罪。

mean_cn: n. 对……的补救；对……的治疗方法
sentence: This pill is an excellent remedy for a headache.
sentence_trans: 这种药丸是治疗头痛的良药。

sentence: She not only does Japanese translation but also, on occasion, Korean.
sentence_trans: 她不仅做日语翻译，偶尔也做些韩语翻译。

sentence: Many children's belief in Santa Claus stops when they become adults.
sentence_trans: 许多孩子都相信圣诞老人的存在，但他们往往长大后就不信了。

sentence: It's impolite to break in on other people's conversations.
sentence_trans: 打断他人的谈话是不礼貌的。

sentence: This couple have been hanging about on the beach all day.
sentence_trans: 这对夫妇整天都在海边闲逛。

sentence: The experiment didn't quite turn out like how he had expected.
sentence_trans: 实验结果并不像他所设想的那样。

sentence: He puts some of his salary aside every month to buy a car in future.
sentence_trans: 他每个月都把一部分薪水存起来，想在将来买辆车。

sentence: She is inquiring of where her hotel is.
sentence_trans: 她正在询问她的旅馆在哪里。

sentence: They had a fall out and no longer speak to each other.
sentence_trans: 他们吵了一架，然后也不和对方说话。

sentence: She copied the story by hand.
sentence_trans: 她把这个故事用手抄了一遍。

sentence: He quickly worked out the answer to the math problem.
sentence_trans: 他很快算出了这道数学题的答案。

mean_cn: phr. 无可争辩，毫无疑问
sentence: Working through the night, his commitment to the job is beyond question!
sentence_trans: 他在深夜加班，他对工作的投入毫无疑问！

mean_cn: phr. 不管多大代价，无论如何
sentence: The player was determined to protect the ball at all costs.
sentence_trans: 这个球员不惜一切代价坚决护球。

sentence: He put forward his proposal for how they could increase product sales.
sentence_trans: 他就如何提高产品销量提出了一项建议。

sentence: She is looking through the books on the shelves.
sentence_trans: 她在浏览书架上的书。

sentence: They are very strict with their daughter.
sentence_trans: 他们对自己的女儿严格要求。

mean_cn: phr. 和 ... 结婚，致力于…的
sentence: He's a teacher who is married to his job.
sentence_trans: 他是一位教师，一心扑在自己的工作上。

sentence: We finally got in contact with the rescue team.
sentence_trans: 我们终于和救援队取得了联系。

sentence: I want to make an insurance claim for the damage to my car.
sentence_trans: 我想对我的汽车遭受的损失提出保险索赔。

sentence: He takes a fancy to motorbikes.
sentence_trans: 他喜欢摩托车。

sentence: Despite his tight schedule, he decided to take his daughter to school in person.
sentence_trans: 尽管时间很紧，他还是决定亲自送孩子上学。

sentence: Conscious of the show being about to start, he adjusted his tie and smiled.
sentence_trans: 意识到节目即将开始，他调整了领带并微笑。

sentence: He had a rather alarming encounter with a wild pig.
sentence_trans: 他曾经偶遇过一头野猪，真是惊险。

sentence: He felt quite disappointed at his test score.
sentence_trans: 他对他这次的考试成绩失望透顶。

sentence: He has commented on the picture.
sentence_trans: 他对这张图片作了评论。

sentence: His head is small in relation to his body.
sentence_trans: 和他的身体相比，他的头很小。

sentence: Everyone immediately took to the new classmate who seemed very friendly.
sentence_trans: 每个人都立刻喜欢上了那位看起来很友好的新同学。

sentence: He broke his leg in the forest; furthermore, some strange creatures were watching him.
sentence_trans: 他在森林中摔断了腿，此外，他还被某些奇怪的生物盯上了。

sentence: She has stood up for women's rights for a long time.
sentence_trans: 她长时间维护女性的权利。

mean_cn: adv. 附近，大约，转向，左右，周围；  prep. 在附近，关于，在……周围，忙于
sentence: The lipstick costs about 220 yuan.
sentence_trans: 这口红的售价大约是220元。

sentence: He wants to think of something that can change him.
sentence_trans: 他想要想出一些能改变他自己的东西。

sentence: He has to hurry up, or he will miss the bus.
sentence_trans: 他得快点，否则就赶不上公共汽车了。

sentence: Let's wipe out all the bugs with this insecticide.
sentence_trans: 让我们用这瓶杀虫剂消灭所有的虫子吧。

mean_cn: phr. （在法律上）有义务的，有责任的
sentence: The cat's owner was liable for the damage his cat had caused.
sentence_trans: 猫的主人对猫造成的损失负有责任。

sentence: The woman's beauty had impressed itself on her memory.
sentence_trans: 那位女士的美丽给她留下了深刻的印象。

sentence: There are various ways to protect against sunburn, for instance wearing sunscreen.
sentence_trans: 有很多方法可以防止晒伤，比如涂防晒霜。

sentence: Police warned a prisoner had escaped and was still at large.
sentence_trans: 警方提醒道，一名犯人越狱了，现仍在逃。

mean_cn: phr. 对...有抵抗力的，（尤指对变化和新思想）抗拒的
sentence: Gene editing has made the apple more resistant to the disease.
sentence_trans: 基因编辑增强了苹果对这种病害的抵抗力。

sentence: They are distributing food to the people in need.
sentence_trans: 他们正在把食物分发给有需要的人。

sentence: She would acquaint herself with the local culture before visiting an unfamiliar city.
sentence_trans: 在去一个陌生的城市旅游之前，她总会预先熟悉当地文化。

sentence: It occurred to her that she could give her mother a plant as a gift.
sentence_trans: 她想到可以送妈妈一盆植物当作生日礼物。

sentence: He arrived at his friend's house 20 minutes ahead of time.
sentence_trans: 他提前20分钟到达朋友家。

sentence: He hopes that in the future he'll be able to fly!
sentence_trans: 他希望在未来他能够飞起来！

sentence: He yielded to the temptation after half an hour.
sentence_trans: 半小时后，他还是屈服于诱惑之下。

sentence: These guys have all really gone in for recycling!
sentence_trans: 这些人都实实在在从事于回收工作。

sentence: He deals in tea.
sentence_trans: 他做茶叶生意。

sentence: By means of daily study, she managed to get an A+.
sentence_trans: 凭借着每日的努力学习，她得到了A加的成绩。

sentence: The book gives lots of useful information concerning plants.
sentence_trans: 这本书介绍了许多关于植物的有用信息。

sentence: He booked his flight tickets in advance.
sentence_trans: 他提前订好了飞机票。

sentence: I cannot put up with the smell of these shoes.
sentence_trans: 我忍受不了这鞋子的臭味。

sentence: I am ready to present my proposal for our company.
sentence_trans: 我准备好对公司发展提出一个新提案。

sentence: Gazing at the bright moon, he became homesick for his hometown.

sentence_trans: 这两个家庭养育子女的方式完全不同。

mean_cn: adj. 无意义的，不得要领的

sentence: Their companies are working together in a partnership for the project.

sentence: His winning the Nobel Prize for Literature was a great accomplishment.

sentence: She likes to keep a regular blog of her daily life.
sentence_trans: 她喜欢在博客里发表关于自己日常生活的文章。

sentence: The man had a tiring day at work.
sentence_trans: 那个男人辛苦工作了一整天。

sentence: The airplane is commencing its takeoff.

mean_cn: n. 老生常谈；  adj. 平常的
sentence: Nowadays, even in rural areas, it's commonplace to pay electronically instead of using cash.
sentence_trans: 如今，即使是在农村地区，用电子支付代替现金支付也已是常事。

sentence_trans: 这对夫妻喜欢一起在乡间骑脚踏车兜风。

sentence: "How do you stay so skinny?" "I eat lots of fruits and vegetables."
sentence_trans: “你怎么能这么瘦？”“我吃很多水果和蔬菜。”

sentence_trans: 这座城堡是座宏伟的建筑。

sentence: Mules are used to carry heavy loads on their saddles.
sentence_trans: 人们把重物放在骡子的鞍上，让它们运送重物。

sentence: The preacher is giving an inspiring sermon.

sentence: She is pleasant and communicative when dealing with customers.

sentence_trans: 规划婚后生活能帮助这对夫妻在未来有明确的目标。

sentence_trans: 这个曾经无比团结的乐队现在解散了。

sentence: He is one of the magazine's most popular columnists.

sentence: If you want to search for something online, a browser is needed.
sentence_trans: 如果你想在网上搜索东西，就需要一个浏览器。

sentence_trans: 他召开新闻发布会，公开反对新建化工厂。

sentence_trans: 随着电动汽车充电站数量的增加，电动汽车也更受欢迎了。

sentence: The interviewer is looking at his resume to ask questions.

sentence: This is definitely one of the most tricky projects he's worked on.

sentence: A true role reversal is when children take care of their elderly parents.

sentence: Even a dog can be very stylish.
sentence_trans: 狗也能打扮得很时尚。

sentence: Having fun with friends on the beach is always a joyful occasion.

sentence_trans: 夏威夷的这两只婆欧里鸟，可能是世界上仅存的两只婆欧里鸟了。

sentence: He is one of the most popular cartoonists in the world right now.

sentence: She showed great diligence in her completing schoolwork.
sentence_trans: 她在完成学业的过程中表现出了极其勤奋的精神。

sentence_trans: 我们能把你老唱片上的音乐转存到光盘上，以便你在家也能听。

sentence_trans: 我摸了摸他的前额，感到很烫，他应该发烧了。

sentence_trans: 院长在毕业典礼上向每个毕业生都表示了祝贺。

sentence_trans: 这位女士对这只狗很纵容，甚至可以容忍其他人容忍不了的脏乱！

sentence_trans: 那个穿着白衣的男人看起来像是消失在了浓雾中。

mean_cn: phr. 达到这样的程度以至…

sentence_trans: 我有太多工作要做，以至于我觉得自己要疯了。

sentence: In this cage I will be safe from the sharks.

sentence_trans: 请认真填写这张申请表。

sentence_trans: 只要一有人喊他，他就立刻到了。

sentence: I don't know why my colleague always makes fun of me!
sentence_trans: 我真是不明白为什么我的同事总是取笑我！

sentence: They are debating over several key issues in the presidential race.
sentence_trans: 他们在总统竞选上就一些关键问题进行辩论。

sentence: The nurse makes sure that she calls in on Mr. Smith every Monday.
sentence_trans: 护士确保每周一都会前去拜访史密斯先生。

mean_cn: phr. 不愿意；不情愿；不愿做…的

mean_cn: phr. 身体状态好，身材好
