sentence_trans: 这个大叔身材很好，因为他每天都锻炼。

sentence: The small town became prosperous during the Gold Rush.
sentence_trans: 这座小镇因为淘金热而繁荣起来。

sentence: He was discontent with the hotel's service so he gave a bad review.
sentence_trans: 他对这个酒店的服务很不满意，所以他给了个差评。

sentence: This house cost me an enormous amount of money.
sentence_trans: 这栋房子花了我一大笔钱。

sentence: We were all delighted with our success in the business deal.
sentence_trans: 我们都因为在生意中的成功而喜悦。

sentence: This volcano could erupt at any moment.
sentence_trans: 这个火山随时可能爆发。

sentence_trans: 我在冬天的时候老是感冒。

sentence_trans: 小男孩善良的举动值得表扬。

sentence: He is waiting for his opponent to make a move.
sentence_trans: 他在等着他的对手走下一步。

sentence: He immersed himself in writing his new book.
sentence_trans: 他埋头于自己新书的写作之中。

sentence: The math equation was a hard nut to crack.
sentence_trans: 这个数学方程可真是个棘手的问题。

sentence: In contrast to the apple, the watermelon is gigantic.
sentence_trans: 和苹果相比，西瓜看起来简直是巨型。

sentence: Many people came to vote in the recent elections.
sentence_trans: 许多人去参加选举投票。

sentence: The little boy takes delight in finishing his homework.
sentence_trans: 小男孩以做作业为乐。

mean_cn: phr. 狂欢，玩得开心，享受

sentence_trans: 假期真是太棒了，我们玩得很开心。

sentence: She became fat owing to her bad eating habits.
sentence_trans: 她长胖是因为她不良的饮食习惯。

mean_cn: phr. 从…到…的范围；在…中变化
sentence: Bankers predict that the price of oil per barrel will range from $50 to $100.
sentence_trans: 银行家们预测明年的每桶油价可能在50美元至于100美元之间波动。

sentence: I am so small in comparison to the giant.
sentence_trans: 和巨人相比我太渺小了。

sentence: The man is ready to run.
sentence_trans: 他准备好开始跑了。

sentence: She got engaged to her boyfriend, look at the engagement ring.
sentence_trans: 她跟男朋友订婚啦，看那订婚戒指。

sentence: The school is within walking distance of my home.
sentence_trans: 学校很近，从我家步行就能到。

sentence: The little girl was in the mood to travel by sea.
sentence_trans: 小女孩兴致勃勃地乘船旅行。

sentence: Time ticks away, every second of every day.
sentence_trans: 时光每一分每一秒都在流逝。

sentence: She lost control of her emotions.
sentence_trans: 她的情绪已失控。

mean_cn: phr. 无法表达(形容不出)
sentence: After seeing the magic trick, their amazement was beyond expression.
sentence_trans: 在看过这个魔术之后，他们的震惊无以言表。

sentence: His smart suit is fit for the occasion.
sentence_trans: 这套时髦西服真适合这个场合。

sentence: His friends can't stand his out of tune singing.
sentence_trans: 他的朋友简直受不了他唱歌走调。

sentence: The goats are fighting for their homeland.
sentence_trans: 山羊们正在为它们的家园而战。

sentence: The building materials were piled up on the construction site.
sentence_trans: 施工现场的建材被堆放得井井有条。

sentence: You can see so much from this vantage point.
sentence_trans: 从这个有利地点你可以将很多东西尽收眼底。

sentence: He will set forth on his journey in 30 minutes.
sentence_trans: 半小时后他即将启程去旅行。

mean_cn: phr. 失去线索，失去消息，失去联系

sentence_trans: 脚印在雪地里消失了，我们无法继续追踪猎物了！

sentence: She had to dip into her savings to pay the bill.
sentence_trans: 她需要动用她的存款来付账单。

sentence: It's wise to make a list and check off the things you need to do.

mean_cn: phr. 忙着做……，忙于某事物

sentence: Ice turns into water when it is heated.
sentence_trans: 当受热时，冰会变成水。

sentence: Each member of our team plays a part in our success.
sentence_trans: 我们团队的每个成员都在我们的成功中起着作用。

sentence: The two girls are so similar to each other.

mean_cn: phr. 引起某人的好奇心
sentence: Something in the brown box aroused the cat's curiosity.
sentence_trans: 那个棕色盒子里面的东西引起了猫咪的好奇心。

sentence: Every spring they shear off the sheep's wool and sell it.
sentence_trans: 每年春天他们都要剪掉羊毛去卖。

sentence: The man holding the megaphone wanted to draw people's attention to his artwork.
sentence_trans: 那个拿着扩音器的男人想要引起大家对他的作品的注意。

sentence: He will take over the family's business after his grandfather retires.
sentence_trans: 他会在爷爷退休的时候接管家里的生意。

sentence: He hasn't had food for days, and is eager to eat the steak.
sentence_trans: 他几天没吃东西了，非常渴望能吃掉这块牛排。

sentence: I need to take a day off because I have a cold.
sentence_trans: 我感冒了，我需要请一天假。

mean_cn: phr. 全额退款，全额偿还
sentence: The store gave me a full refund even though I had opened the package.
sentence_trans: 即使我打开了这个包裹，这家店还是把钱全部退给了我。

mean_cn: phr. 不知道，没有察觉到，没有意识到
sentence: That man is unaware of his surroundings while listening to music on his phone.
sentence_trans: 那个用手机听音乐的男人没注意到周遭的事物。

sentence: All of the students are getting involved in the classroom activity.
sentence_trans: 所有同学都参与到了教室活动中。

sentence: The document you requested was attached to this email.
sentence_trans: 你要的文件附在了这封邮件里。

sentence: The fans are hoping to catch a glimpse of the star player.
sentence_trans: 球迷们期待着能看到明星球员。

sentence: The side effect of this medicine is that it may cause dizziness.
sentence_trans: 这种药的副作用是可能导致头晕。

sentence: This amount of food is inadequate for a whole family.
sentence_trans: 这一点食物不够喂饱一家人。

sentence: She got off with this cute guy at the party.
sentence_trans: 她在聚会上和这个帅哥好上了。

sentence: Can I take a photograph of your dog?
sentence_trans: 我可以拍一张你狗狗的照片吗？

sentence: In terms of wealth, he's very rich. But he is not always happy.
sentence_trans: 就财富而言，他很富有。但他不总是开心。

sentence: He took an interest in what his friend was making.
sentence_trans: 他对他的朋友在做的东西产生了兴趣。

mean_cn: phr. 会议厅，会议场所及教室会议室
sentence: The newly-built conference room is very modern.
sentence_trans: 新建的会议室非常现代风。

sentence: A dog is always loyal to his master.
sentence_trans: 狗狗总是对主人很忠诚。

sentence: Her suggestion is still under consideration by the couple.
sentence_trans: 这对夫妇仍在考虑她的建议。

sentence: They turned against each other because of a minor dispute.
sentence_trans: 因为一些小小的争执，他们彼此反目。

sentence: The sea gull is about to land in the sea.
sentence_trans: 这只海鸥将要在海上着陆。

sentence: Welcome! Make yourself at home.
sentence_trans: 欢迎！不要客气。

sentence: Believe it or not, this dress is made of chocolate.
sentence_trans: 信不信由你，这件礼服是由巧克力制构成的。

sentence: My wife gave birth to a little girl.
sentence_trans: 我的妻子生了个女儿。

sentence: We can buy tax free goods at international airports.
sentence_trans: 我们可以在国际机场买到免税商品。

sentence: The old couple are trying to wave down this taxi.
sentence_trans: 这对老夫妇正挥手让出租车停下来。

sentence: People tend to be skeptical of the sincerity of his smile.
sentence_trans: 公众总是怀疑他的笑容不真诚。

sentence: The actress is well-known for her beauty and acting skills.
sentence_trans: 这个女演员因她的美貌和演技而著名。

sentence: The answer to this question is not "no" but rather "yes".
sentence_trans: 这个问题的答案不是“否”，而是“是”。

sentence: The quarrel between my parents made it difficult for me to do my homework.
sentence_trans: 父母之间的争吵让我难以静下心写作业。

sentence: She makes an effort to finish the two tasks at the same time.
sentence_trans: 她努力同时完成两项任务。

sentence: Try not to exert pressure on him, he has been working very hard!
sentence_trans: 别再给他施加压力了，他已经很努力了！

sentence: Nearly a thousand years later, this buried city came to light.
sentence_trans: 近千年之后，这座地下古城才为众人所知。

sentence: No need to be afraid of it. It's just your shadow.
sentence_trans: 不要害怕它。它是你自己的影子。

sentence: "The next arrival was no other than the star of the movie."
sentence_trans: “下一个到达的正是那部电影的明星。”

sentence: Both of us quickly ate up our dinner.
sentence_trans: 我们两个都迅速吃光了晚饭。

sentence: He came in for some heavy criticism of his loud phone call in the library.
sentence_trans: 由于他在图书馆大声打电话，他受到了严厉的批评。

sentence: The relationship came to an end and the couple went their separate ways.
sentence_trans: 这对情侣的关系走向了尽头，他们自此分道扬镳。

sentence: The forest can catch fire very easily.
sentence_trans: 森林很容易着火。

sentence: We gave our baby sunglasses to block out the sun's harmful rays.
sentence_trans: 我们给宝宝戴上墨镜，阻挡阳光里的有害射线。

sentence: It is apparent to the man that the woman is pregnant.
sentence_trans: 这个人明显知道这位女士怀孕了。

sentence: The broken engine put a halt to our road trip.
sentence_trans: 引擎坏掉了，中断了我们的公路旅行。

sentence: The woman was terrified at the thought of flying.
sentence_trans: 这个女人想到飞行就怕得要死。

mean_cn: phr. 在与…竞争之中；与……比赛
sentence: The swimmers are all in competition with one another.
sentence_trans: 游泳选手们正在互相竞争。

sentence: How can the shop owner discriminate against disabled people?!
sentence_trans: 这家商店的老板怎么能歧视残疾人呢？！

sentence: I keep in touch with all of my friends using my cell phone.
sentence_trans: 我通过手机与所有朋友保持联系。

sentence: She's a funny girl who likes making faces at me.
sentence_trans: 她很搞笑，总是对我对鬼脸。

sentence: She fills up her bottle with water at the water tap.
sentence_trans: 她在水龙头那里把瓶子灌满了水。

sentence: The adult king penguin is distinct from the young chicks.
sentence_trans: 这只成年帝企鹅和其它雏鸟截然不同。

sentence: The passers-by are indifferent to the little girl's suffering.
sentence_trans: 路人们对小女孩的痛苦都漠不关心。

sentence: From now on, we will be in strong cooperation with your company.
sentence_trans: 从现在起，我们就与贵公司密切合作。

sentence: Those racing horses are all lagging behind the blue one.
sentence_trans: 所有的赛马都落在了那只蓝色的后面。

sentence: The weight of this bag bears on my shoulders.
sentence_trans: 这个包裹的所有重量都压在我的肩上。

sentence: He took the day off to enjoy himself.
sentence_trans: 他在休息日去享受自我了。

sentence: Take care! Make sure you wear a helmet.
sentence_trans: 当心点，确定你戴上了头盔。

sentence: The three girls are enjoying the rich cultural environment in Japan.
sentence_trans: 这三个女生很喜欢日本丰富多彩的文化环境。

sentence: My desk is piled with unfinished documents.
sentence_trans: 我的桌子堆积着待完成的文件。

sentence: The color of the wooden doors has faded away over time.
sentence_trans: 随着时间的流逝，木门的颜色在渐渐消失。

sentence: To be ignorant of social injustice will only make things worse.
sentence_trans: 对社会不公平的不管不顾只会使情况变得更糟。

sentence: The trains run parallel to each other.
sentence_trans: 这两辆火车与对方并排而行。

sentence: He is second to none among all the employees.
sentence_trans: 他是所有员工中最优秀的一位。

sentence: He makes a fortune from running his own company.
sentence_trans: 他开公司发财了。

sentence: We are all in compliance with traffic rules.
sentence_trans: 我们都遵守交通规则。

mean_cn: phr. 逐步适应，放松自己
sentence: It will take him time to ease in to his new role of house-husband.
sentence_trans: 他需要点时间来逐步适应成为家庭主夫。

sentence: The last piece fits into this jigsaw puzzle perfectly.
sentence_trans: 这最后一块和拼图完美契合。

sentence: I exercise every day to keep fit.
sentence_trans: 我每天运动以保持健康。

sentence: I am one brilliant idea away from making my fortune.
sentence_trans: 我和发财只差一个好点子的距离。

mean_cn: phr. 不得不做；受到敦促去做
sentence: The little girl was urged to eat more vegetables by her mother.
sentence_trans: 小女孩被妈妈敦促着多吃蔬菜。

sentence: You have such a good taste in interior design.
sentence_trans: 你在室内设计上很有品味。

sentence: These students often volunteer to clean up the streets.
sentence_trans: 这些学生经常自愿打扫街道卫生。

sentence: My boss is so angry that he threatens to fire me if I am late again.
sentence_trans: 我老板很生气，扬言如果我再迟到就开了我。

sentence: The mother is very annoyed with her son's behavior.
sentence_trans: 这位母亲对她孩子的行为感到非常恼火。

word: as poor as a church mouse
sentence: Having lost my job, I'm as poor as a church mouse.
sentence_trans: 失去工作的我简直一贫如洗。

sentence: Now let me expand on our basic idea and give you some more details.
sentence_trans: 现在让我详述一下我们的观点。

sentence: She asked him to tidy up the living room.
sentence_trans: 她让他把客厅收拾收拾。

sentence: He has an insight into future market developments.
sentence_trans: 他能洞察未来市场的发展。

mean_cn: phr. 不合适的，不适当的
sentence: It is inappropriate for you to talk on your phone in the cinema.
sentence_trans: 在电影院讲手机实在太不合适了。

sentence: They built a statue in commemoration of the war heroes.
sentence_trans: 为了纪念这些战争英雄，人们为此建造了雕像。

sentence: The detective inferred from the footprints that the suspect was in this house.
sentence_trans: 侦探从脚印推断出罪犯应该就在这所房子里。

sentence: These dolls have been put in order of largest to smallest.
sentence_trans: 这些娃娃按照从大到小的顺序排列着。

sentence: Kids think without prejudice and will make friends with anybody.
sentence_trans: 孩子们通常没有偏见地思考，他们和谁都能成为朋友。

sentence: The footpath is paved with small bricks.
sentence_trans: 小路上铺满了小砖头。

mean_cn: phr. 十分妒忌，非常嫉妒
sentence: He is green with envy when seeing others travel around the world.
sentence_trans: 他看到其他人环游世界时，心里非常嫉妒。

sentence: Run faster to catch up with him.
sentence_trans: 跑快点去追上他。

sentence: Our tour guide told us a story about the Great Wall.
sentence_trans: 导游给我们讲了一个关于长城的故事。

mean_cn: phr. 处于某人控制范围之外
sentence: My car was beyond my control！
sentence_trans: 我的车失去控制了！

sentence: That sad single girl is dying to have a boyfriend.
sentence_trans: 那个悲伤的单身女孩很想有个男朋友。

sentence: I would rather eat vegetables than junk food.
sentence_trans: 我宁愿吃蔬菜也不吃油炸食品。

sentence: We all agree on the solid fact that peace is the only way to prosperity.
sentence_trans: 我们都一致认为：和平是通往繁荣的唯一道路，这是一个不争的事实。

sentence: We are happy to have our guide lead the way for us.
sentence_trans: 我们很高兴有导游给我们带路。

mean_cn: phr. 迎接；引领；传报；引发；产生，开创
sentence: They had a party to usher in the new year.
sentence_trans: 他们开了一个派对来迎接新年。

sentence: From that moment on, I knew I wanted to be a pilot.
sentence_trans: 从那时起，我就知道我想成为一名飞行员。

sentence: He confessed to his computer crime, admitting that he had hacked the confidential website.
sentence_trans: 他供认了自己的电脑犯罪行径，承认自己曾入侵过这个机密网站。

sentence: He really exerted himself during training.
sentence_trans: 他真的很努力锻炼。

sentence: He has committed a crime by stealing from this lady.
sentence_trans: 他从这位女士身上盗窃的行为就是犯罪。

sentence: Being punctual is of prime importance for food delivery couriers.
sentence_trans: 准时送达对于外卖小哥们来说是极其重要的。

sentence: Towards the end of the marathon she was showing signs of distress.
sentence_trans: 接近马拉松终点时，她显出极难受的样子。

sentence: This lying patient was diagnosed with lung cancer.
sentence_trans: 这位卧病在床的患者已被确诊为肺癌。

sentence: It's hard to refrain from smoking, but I did it.
sentence_trans: 戒烟很难，但我做到了。

mean_cn: phr. 埋头于某事，对…入迷
sentence: He buries himself in his work every day and night.
sentence_trans: 他从早到晚都埋头于他的工作当中。

sentence: When you study, you ought to sit up straight.
sentence_trans: 学习时，你应该身体坐直。

sentence: She keeps her fingers crossed for good luck.
sentence_trans: 她祈求好运。

sentence: In the circumstance, the only thing the boy could do was run away.
sentence_trans: “在这种情况下，这个小男孩能做的只有跑了。”

sentence: I have no time to have dinner, so I have to eat while working.
sentence_trans: 我没时间吃晚饭，所以我只能边工作边吃。

mean_cn: phr. 变得熟悉，与……熟悉起来
sentence: It takes time for her to get familiar with her neighbor.
sentence_trans: 她需要一些时间来和邻居熟悉起来。

sentence: The cat peers around the corner out of curiosity.
sentence_trans: 猫咪出于好奇在角落窥探。

sentence: Water is in short supply in this area.
sentence_trans: 这片区域水资源短缺。

sentence: She treats her adopted child as her own.
sentence_trans: 她对这个收养的孩子视如己出。

sentence: The clothes he is wearing are out of style.
sentence_trans: 他穿的衣服已经过时了。

sentence: There are quite a number of cars in the parking lot; I can't find mine!
sentence_trans: 停车场上有相当多的车，我都找不到我的了！

sentence: The doctor took pity on the patient's family after sharing the bad news.
sentence_trans: 医生们对得知坏消息的病人家属表示同情。

sentence: We got some pocket money from our mom. Let's buy some snacks!
sentence_trans: 我们从妈妈那里得到了一些零花钱。走去买点零食！

sentence: He was out of condition so he decided to get fit.
sentence_trans: 他身体不好，所以决定要去锻炼。

sentence: They walked through this bridge at the risk of falling down to the river.
sentence_trans: 他们冒着掉进河里的危险走过了这座桥。

sentence: Her smile showed that she was content with the treatment.
sentence_trans: 她的笑容显示出她对治疗效果很满意。

sentence: She recently formed the habit of going to sleep early everyday.
sentence_trans: 她最近养成了每天早睡的习惯。

sentence: He is engaged in his work of looking for new stars.
sentence_trans: 他从事天文工作，寻找新的星体。

mean_cn: phr. 目的地，旅游胜地，旅游目的地
sentence: The Eiffel tower in Paris is a popular tourist destination.
sentence_trans: 巴黎的埃菲尔铁塔是一个著名的旅行目的地。

sentence: He is incapable of lifting the heavy weight.
sentence_trans: 他不能举起这个巨大的重量。

sentence: They could have made a deal but the buyer pulled out of the contract.
sentence_trans: 他们原本可以完成交易，但是买家在最后放弃签约。

mean_cn: phr. 对...有抵御能力的，抗拒的，抵抗的
sentence: The bacteria is resistant to the antibiotics.
sentence_trans: 这些病菌对这些抗生素产生了抗药性。

mean_cn: phr. 苦苦思索而弄清楚或解决，解决难题
sentence: It takes him hours to puzzle out the sudoku.
sentence_trans: 他花了几个小时来解决这道数独。

sentence: The mechanic propped up the car with a car jack in order to fix it.
sentence_trans: 机械师用千斤顶把车撑起来好进行修理。

sentence: News can be spread very fast through word of mouth.
sentence_trans: 消息可以在口口相传中很快传播。

sentence: The dog made the room a mess and his owner is teaching him a lesson.
sentence_trans: 这只狗把房间弄得一团乱，他的主人正在教训他。

sentence: The little boy is eager for a taste of the cake.
sentence_trans: 小男孩很想尝尝那块蛋糕。

sentence: He closed up his store at the end of the day.
sentence_trans: 他在一天结束时关闭了店门。

sentence: He slept well on the plane and felt at home.
sentence_trans: 他在飞机上睡的很好很舒服。

sentence: Many people spend too much time on their phones and computers.
sentence_trans: 人们在手机和电脑上花的时间太多了。

mean_cn: phr. 使人振奋，打起精神
sentence: He is trying to raise his friend's spirits.
sentence_trans: 他正试着让他的朋友打起精神来。

mean_cn: phr. 视而不见，熟视无睹
sentence: It is all too easy to 'turn a blind eye' and leave the problem to others.
sentence_trans: 对这个问题视而不见然后把锅甩给别人实在是太容易了。

sentence: The girl is taking an active part in the class discussions.
sentence_trans: 这个小女孩在课堂上积极参与讨论。

sentence: I shouldn't eat this burger; I'm already out of shape.
sentence_trans: 我不该再吃这个汉堡了，我已经很胖了。

sentence: Dinner was ready by the time I arrived home.
sentence_trans: 我回家的时候晚饭已经准备好了。

sentence: I made this plan at the instance of one of my colleagues.
sentence_trans: 我是在一个同事的提议下做了这个计划书的。

sentence: He always looks down on others.
sentence_trans: 他总是看不起别人。

sentence: "With reference to your job application, we'll write to you in a week."
sentence_trans: "关于你申请工作一事，一周以后我们会写信回复你。"

mean_cn: phr. 觉得做某事很困难
sentence: I found it difficult to finish my work today.
sentence_trans: 我觉得在今天之内完成我的工作很困难。

sentence: This woman creates a balance between work and family.
sentence_trans: 这位女士在工作和生活间找到了一种平衡。

sentence: These people are diverse from each other.
sentence_trans: 这些人和其他人都彼此不同。

sentence: His income was tied up with the contract he'd reached with his client.
sentence_trans: 他的收入与他和客户达成的合同紧密联系。

sentence: The grandfather is sitting at the head of the table.
sentence_trans: 爷爷坐在餐桌的最前面。

sentence: The village was under attack by rebel groups.
sentence_trans: 这个村庄遭受了来自叛军的攻击。

sentence: Japanese is the official language of Japan.
sentence_trans: 日语是日本的官方语言。

sentence: This dog is infected with a virus.
sentence_trans: 这只狗感染了病毒。

sentence: Our manager cast light on the plan in the meeting.
sentence_trans: 我们经理在会上向我们阐明了这个计划。

sentence: She is suspicious of the report from her business partner.
sentence_trans: 她对自己商务合伙人的报告很怀疑。

sentence: After the lightning struck him, he died then and there.
sentence_trans: 雷电打在他身上，他当场死亡。

sentence: She thinks up a new idea after reading this book.
sentence_trans: 在读完这本书后，她想出了一个新主意。

sentence: It's hard for me to tell the twins apart.
sentence_trans: 让我区分一对双胞胎是很难的。

mean_cn: phr. 一步步地，逐步地，逐渐地
sentence: Step by step, we are getting closer to the destination.
sentence_trans: 我们一步一步地接近目的地。

sentence: The bully always sneers at me because I'm fat!
sentence_trans: 那个恶霸总是因为我胖而嘲笑我。

sentence: It is beyond doubt that 1 plus 1 is 2.
sentence_trans: 一加一等于二是毫无疑问的。

sentence: Kids, please stand side by side for a family photo.
sentence_trans: 孩子们，请肩并肩站好来照家庭照。

sentence: This cat is wary of someone approaching.
sentence_trans: 这只猫咪提防着有人靠近。

sentence: That young man is having trouble in repairing his broken car.
sentence_trans: 那个年轻男子感觉修车很困难。

sentence: For a foodie, eating gourmet food takes priority over anything else.
sentence_trans: 对一个吃货来说，美食高于一切。

sentence: He was worn out after a long day's work.
sentence_trans: 工作了一整天后他累坏了。

mean_cn: phr.易于，往往会，倾向于，有助于
sentence: He tends to take a pessimistic attitude towards his job.
sentence_trans: 他工作时倾向于往消极的方向想。

sentence: The old couple take many factors into consideration when planning a trip.
sentence_trans: 当这对老夫妻计划出门旅行时，他们考虑许多因素。

mean_cn: phr. 遵守，遵从，顺从，符合
sentence: This is a non-smoking area. You should be in compliance with the regulation.
sentence_trans: 这里是非吸烟区，你们应该遵守规矩。

sentence: With so much work to do, he threw up his hands in despair.
sentence_trans: 要做的工作太多了，他绝望地举起双手。

sentence: To the delight of the little boy, his mother gave him a toy car.
sentence_trans: 令这个小男孩开心的是，妈妈带了一个玩具车来给他。

mean_cn: phr. 以…而出名，赢得…的声誉
sentence: He soon gained a reputation for first-class cuisine.
sentence_trans: 凭借精湛的厨艺，他很快就赢得了声望。

sentence: In contrast with his casual look, the formal look is more suitable for an interview.
sentence_trans: 和休闲的装束相比，他的正装更适合穿去面试。

sentence: He is rather susceptible to illnesses.
sentence_trans: 他容易染上疾病。

sentence: Dentists place much emphasis on the importance of brushing your teeth every day.
sentence_trans: 牙医非常强调每天刷牙的重要性。

sentence: The year ahead and what will happen is still in the balance.
sentence_trans: 下一年的一切都还未卜。

mean_cn: phr. 依靠自己，自力更生，自食其力
sentence: This little farmer learned to stand on her own two feet from an early age.
sentence_trans: 这个小农民小小年纪就学会了自力更生。

mean_cn: phr. 一年到头，终年，四季
sentence: I visit this park all year round.
sentence_trans: 我一年四季都来这个公园。

sentence: They went into his office to talk in private.
sentence_trans: 他们去了他办公室私下交谈。

sentence: She wants to be rid of all the clutter in her life.
sentence_trans: 她摆脱了她生活中不怎么需要的东西。

sentence: Will robots take our places in the future?
sentence_trans: 在未来，机器人会取代我们吗？

sentence: There is a wealth of information about the galaxy in this book.
sentence_trans: 这本书里有大量的关于银河系的资料。

sentence: Baby, I love you with all my heart!
sentence_trans: 宝贝，我全心全意地爱你！

sentence: Her job is to take charge of the staff and make sure they work together.
sentence_trans: 她的工作是负责这些员工并保证他们相互协作。

sentence: She stripped down the bed before washing the sheets.
sentence_trans: 她在洗床单之前将它们从床上拆了下来。

sentence: She is in possession of a large brown leather bag.
sentence_trans: 她拥有一个棕色的大皮包。

sentence: She is getting back at him for destroying her sand castle.
sentence_trans: 她对他实行了报复，因为她的沙雕城堡被弄坏了。

sentence: Thanks for helping me to sort out those papers.
sentence_trans: 谢谢你帮我整理这些文件。

mean_cn: phr. 照…的式样，做出…的样子
sentence: The building was designed in the manner of his architectural influences.
sentence_trans: 这个建筑是按照他的影响建出的式样。

sentence: The golf player is ready to tee off  under the clear blue sky.
sentence_trans: 那个男球手已经准备好在这清澈的蓝天下开球了。

sentence: He is making a complaint to the manager about the awful food in the restaurant.
sentence_trans: 他正向经理抱怨餐厅糟糕的食物。

sentence: Playing on the swing always makes her feel happy.
sentence_trans: 荡秋千总能让她感到开心。

mean_cn: phr. 患难与共，风雨同舟
sentence: They have been together through thick and thin.
sentence_trans: 他们是一对患难与共、风雨同舟的夫妻。

mean_cn: phr. 全力支持，为…加油喝彩，赞助
sentence: It's great to see so many people rooting for our basketball team!
sentence_trans: 有这么多人支持我们篮球队，真是太好了！

sentence: He is trying to ramp up sales.
sentence_trans: 他在努力提升销售额。

sentence: WOW! Her Christmas present is that brand new bag!
sentence_trans: 哇！她的圣诞礼物是个全新的包！

sentence: The new law will come into effect next year.
sentence_trans: 新法律将在下一年生效。

sentence: All flights are subject to delay due to the bad weather.
sentence_trans: 由于天气恶劣，所有航班很容易被延误。

mean_cn: phr. 渐渐过时，正在离开
sentence: This outdated phone is on the way out.
sentence_trans: 这种样式的手机慢慢过时了。

mean_cn: phr. 任凭自己沉溺于…，耽，耽于，醉
sentence: If you are on a diet it's not a good idea to indulge in cakes.
sentence_trans: 如果你在节食的话就不要沉迷于甜食。

sentence: The young man began to waste away because of his disease.
sentence_trans: 这个年轻人因为疾病而日渐消瘦。

sentence: This phone is outdated but I like it none the less.
sentence_trans: 这个手机现在已经过时了，尽管如此，我还是很喜欢它。

sentence: This antique car dates from the 50's.
sentence_trans: 这辆古董车的历史能追溯到50年代。

mean_cn: phr. 搞恶作剧，诈骗，开玩笑
sentence: The girl is playing a trick on her boyfriend.
sentence_trans: 这个女孩在向他男朋友开玩笑。

sentence: The little boy is focusing his attention on his homework.
sentence_trans: 小男孩在集中注意力做作业。

sentence: She was offered the opportunity to manage the team.
sentence_trans: 她被给予了管理这个小组的机会。

sentence: Eating plenty of vegetables and fruits is of benefit to your health.
sentence_trans: 多吃蔬菜水果对健康有益。

sentence: She is in quest of the answer to a difficult question.
sentence_trans: 她在寻找那道难题的答案。

sentence: They made sure to figure in the furniture to the architectural plans.
sentence_trans: 他们往建筑计划里添了一些家具。

mean_cn: adj. 无保留地，无条件地
sentence: She knew it was a great deal so she signed the contract without reservation.
sentence_trans: 她知道这是一笔好生意，所以她毫无保留的签了合同。

mean_cn: phr. 局促不安，心神不宁
sentence: The man is ill at ease waiting outside the room.
sentence_trans: 那个中年男人在门外局促不安。

sentence: He is proficient in playing the piano.
sentence_trans: 他精通钢琴。

sentence: Global warming is heating the planet, a case in point is the melting polar ice caps.
sentence_trans: 全球变暖正在让地球升温，一个恰当例子就是北极冰盖融化。

sentence: He missed out on the chance to catch a big fish while he was sleeping.
sentence_trans: 他睡觉的时候失去了钓一条大鱼的机会。

mean_cn: phr. 热心投身于,开始努力干
sentence: The man throws himself into his work.
sentence_trans: 他开始努力工作了。

sentence: She came out with some fantastic ideas during the meeting.
sentence_trans: 她在开会的时候发表了一个很棒的点子。

sentence: They are lashing out the estate agent because the agent gave them the wrong contract.
sentence_trans: 他们痛斥房地产中介，因为中介给了他们错误的合同。

mean_cn: phr. 渴望，喜爱，爱好，热衷于
sentence: He is keen on reading and he reads every night before going to bed.
sentence_trans: 他很喜欢阅读，每晚都要读了才睡觉。

sentence: The water closet in the hotel is very clean.
sentence_trans: 酒店的盥洗室很干净。

sentence: He tears off his shirt to expose his vest.
sentence_trans: 他扯开了他的衬衫，露出了里面的短袖。

sentence: Money, time, route—you should take account of everything when you plan to travel.
sentence_trans: 钱，时间，路线——计划去旅行时你应该考虑到所有问题。

sentence: She dozed off while she was doing her homework.
sentence_trans: 她在做作业的时候打了个盹。

sentence: The little girl is getting sick of eating broccoli everyday.
sentence_trans: 那个小女孩对于每天吃西兰花感到厌恶了。

sentence: He is enthusiastic about surfing.
sentence_trans: 他对冲浪充满热情。

sentence: Put it in your mouth and chew it up.
sentence_trans: 把它放到嘴里，然后嚼碎。

sentence: I went to the gym every day, without fail.
sentence_trans: 我每天必定去健身房。

sentence: The encouragement from my boss helped me build confidence.
sentence_trans: 领导对我的鼓励帮助我建立了更好工作的信心。

mean_cn: phr. 烧成平地，烧毁，烧光
sentence: This house was burnt down in the fire.
sentence_trans: 这座房子在大火中被烧成了平地。

mean_cn: phr. 得（传染性的病），感染
sentence: The whole family came down with the flu.
sentence_trans: 他们全家都染上流感了。

sentence: Maybe you should wrap up your neck in this cold weather.
sentence_trans: 这么冷的天，或许你得把脖子围起来。

sentence: The mice were chased out of the house by the cat.
sentence_trans: 老鼠被猫赶出了房子。

sentence: The polar ice caps are melting at an alarming rate.
sentence_trans: 极地冰盖正在以惊人的速度融化。

sentence: My job occupies almost all of my time; I need some rest!
sentence_trans: 工作几乎占据了我所有时间，我需要休息！

sentence: Have a go and see if you can solve this puzzle.
sentence_trans: 你试试看能否解开这个难题。

sentence: This is a sign to warn drivers about the dangerous road ahead.
sentence_trans: 这个标志警告人们前方路段有危险。

sentence: The lion is obliged to the man who saved its life.
sentence_trans: 狮子很感激他的救命恩人。

mean_cn: phr. 在调查研究中，正在调查中
sentence: That detective in brown coat said the murder case was still under investigation.
sentence_trans: 那个穿着棕色大衣的侦探说这起谋杀案还在调查中。

sentence: I will always lend an ear to those who want to talk about their problems.
sentence_trans: 每当别人有问题想要倾诉的时候，我总是认真倾听。

mean_cn: phr. 开始认识，开始了解，同…结识，熟悉
sentence: They became acquainted with each other during a business meeting.
sentence_trans: 他俩是在一次商务会议上开始认识对方的。

sentence: He peeps at the neighbours through a hole in the fence.
sentence_trans: 他通过老旧围栏上的洞偷窥邻居。

sentence: She lavishes so much money on shopping.
sentence_trans: 她在购物上大肆花费了很多钱。

sentence: In this area, traffic speeds are limited to 50 miles per hour.
sentence_trans: 在这片区域，交通限速是50公里每小时。

sentence: He is trying to make sense of this complicated book.
sentence_trans: 他试着去理解这本复杂的书。

sentence: The Romans took possession of a very large area of the world.
sentence_trans: 罗马人曾占据世界的大片土地。

mean_cn: phr. 颠倒，混乱，倒转，翻转
sentence: The photographer turned the cityscape upside down in the picture.
sentence_trans: 摄影师在照片里将城市风光颠倒了下。

sentence: I'd like to buy some dried food at the market.
sentence_trans: 我想在市场上买些干货。

sentence: Be mindful of the dangers of driving on such a narrow mountain road.
sentence_trans: 在这样狭窄的山路上开车要注意。

sentence: The upper management of the company are having a meeting.
sentence_trans: 公司的高管正在开会。

mean_cn: phr. 赞赏，归功于，把…归于
sentence: The award winning scientist gave credit to the rest of his team.
sentence_trans: 这名获奖的科学家将成就归功于他的团队。

sentence: I can't help but laugh out loud when my mom tickles me.
sentence_trans: 我妈挠我痒痒的时候我忍不住大笑起来。

sentence: He was confronted with a dangerous situation.
sentence_trans: 他正面临着一个危险的处境。

sentence: People hold the scientist in high esteem for his intellect and impressive theories.
sentence_trans: 人们对这位科学家十分尊敬，因为他拥有杰出的才智并提出了深刻的理论。

sentence: Cactus are well adapted to the harsh environment of the desert.
sentence_trans: 仙人掌能很好地适应沙漠的恶劣环境。

sentence: A good all-round lifestyle is conducive to good health.
sentence_trans: 运动有助于健康。

sentence: The little girl showed respect for her teacher.
sentence_trans: 小女孩对老师表示了尊重。

mean_cn: phr. 增加体重，增肥，长胖了
sentence: He gained weight after he stopped exercising.
sentence_trans: 他在停止运动之后长胖了。

sentence: OMG! I have no fewer than 20 books to read before my final examination.
sentence_trans: 我的天呐！在期末考试之前我至少有20本书要读。

sentence: He is driving in excess of the speed limit.
sentence_trans: 他开车已经超速了。

mean_cn: phr. 觉得能够胜任,觉得身体挺得住
sentence: I don't feel up to going out tonight, I'm sick.
sentence_trans: 我今晚不想出去，我不太舒服。

mean_cn: phr. 撕毁，撕掉撕成碎片
sentence: The unhappy client threatened to tear up the contract.
sentence_trans: 这个不满意的客户威胁着要撕毁协议。

sentence: He puzzled over the broken engine but could do nothing about it.
sentence_trans: 他为这个坏掉的发动机苦苦思考，但什么也做不了。

sentence: Many people thought that he was in the wrong.
sentence_trans: 很多人认为他是错的。

sentence: So many commuters pass in and out of the subway station every day.
sentence_trans: 每天都有很多通勤者在地铁站进进出出。

sentence: The paper started to curl up around the edge.
sentence_trans: 这张纸的边缘开始卷起了。

sentence: Everyone should conform to the rules of the road.
sentence_trans: 每一个人都应该要遵守交通规则。

mean_cn: phr. 跟上，与……齐步前进，跟上…的最新发展
sentence: He is too tired to keep pace with his friends.
sentence_trans: 他太累了以至于不能和他的朋友们齐步前进了。

sentence: She reached out for a handshake.
sentence_trans: 她伸出手来想要握手。

sentence: Take notice of the cracks in the road. Driving over them may be a bad idea.
sentence_trans: 注意路上的裂缝。直接越过去可能是个坏主意。

mean_cn: phr. 不收费，免费的，无偿的
sentence: Children under 1.2m are free of charge to ride the bus.
sentence_trans: 一米二以下的儿童坐公交车是免费的。

sentence: For the treasure, he took a chance by crossing this dangerous river.
sentence_trans: 为了宝藏，他冒险通过这条危机四伏的河。

mean_cn: phr. 突然笑起来，放声大笑
sentence: The team burst into laughter during their meeting in the office.
sentence_trans: 这个团队在他们在办公室开会的时候放声大笑。

sentence: π is approximate to 3.14.
sentence_trans: π约等于3.14。

sentence: Much to her surprise, the boy she likes texted her back.
sentence_trans: 令她相当吃惊的是，她喜欢的男孩回她短信了。

sentence: The man riding the rocket has the advantage over all of us.
sentence_trans: 那个坐火箭的男人超过了我们所有人。

sentence: She builds up her confidence by thinking positive thoughts.
sentence_trans: 她以积极的想法来树立自己的信心。

sentence: The vast majority of people support his argument.
sentence_trans: 大多数人都支持他的观点。

sentence: The good news inspired confidence within them.
sentence_trans: 这个好消息激发了他们的自信。

mean_cn: phr. 接近，有接近…的权利
sentence: Without a keycard you cannot gain access to the building.
sentence_trans: 不刷卡，我就没办法进入这栋大楼。

sentence: You should take everything into account when you plan to travel.
sentence_trans: 计划旅行的时候你应该把所有事情都考虑到。

sentence: This couple are dissatisfied with their meal.
sentence_trans: 这对情侣对他们的菜不满意。

sentence: The waste water is drained away from the city through this pipe.
sentence_trans: 废水通过这根水管从城市排出去了。

sentence: His extraordinary skills led to his sudden rise to fame.
sentence_trans: 他非凡的技能让他忽然成名。

sentence: She tells me something very important on the quiet.
sentence_trans: 她悄悄地告诉我了一些重要的事。

sentence: Unsafely disposing of toxic waste infringes on environmental laws.
sentence_trans: 有毒废料的排泄违背了环境相关的法律。

sentence: She tunes out when her mother shouts at her.
sentence_trans: 她不理会她妈妈的斥责。

sentence: She was feeling sick, so I took her temperature.
sentence_trans: 她觉得不舒服，所以我量了一下她的体温。

mean_cn: phr. 用...雕刻出(引伸为修建)
sentence: These flowers are carved out of a carrot.
sentence_trans: 这些花是用胡萝卜雕刻出来的。

sentence: We were all wondering what made him run off in such haste.
sentence_trans: 我们都在想他为何如此仓皇地逃走。

sentence: The cork popped out of the champagne bottle.
sentence_trans: 香槟塞子突然弹了出来。

sentence: They are on the look out for shooting stars.
sentence_trans: 他们在仔细寻找流星。

sentence: I have a good relationship with my father.
sentence_trans: 我和我爸爸关系很好。

sentence: She's obliged to pay her student loan.
sentence_trans: 她有义务还清她的学生贷款。

sentence: The amount of food available is insufficient for the needs of the cow.
sentence_trans: 食物的数量无法满足牛的需要。

sentence: By comparison to fast food, fruits are much healthier for our body.
sentence_trans: 相比快餐来说，水果要健康得多。

sentence: She is determined to get a good grade in the final exam.
sentence_trans: 她下定决心要在期末考试中取得一个好成绩。

sentence: The doctor said he is unlikely to be fit to play sports for a while.
sentence_trans: 医生说他最近不太适合做运动。

sentence: I hope you have a good appetite, there is a lot of food!
sentence_trans: 希望你有个好胃口，这儿有好多食物！

sentence: She puts the plan into practice.
sentence_trans: 她实施了计划。

sentence: Despite not seeing her for a long time, they still stay in touch with each other.
sentence_trans: 即使已经分开很长时间了，他们依然和对方保持联系。

sentence: His communication came in the form of letters.
sentence_trans: 他以写信的形式和人交流。

mean_cn: phr. 对 ... 容忍(或宽容)
sentence: The mother is trying to be tolerant of her naughty son.
sentence_trans: 这个母亲很努力地容忍她调皮的儿子。

mean_cn: phr. 职业培训，职业发展
sentence: The business woman is optimistic about her career development.
sentence_trans: 这位职场女性对自己的职业发展很乐观。

sentence: Facing up to the challenge ahead, the man felt confident.
sentence_trans: 面对前方的挑战，这人感到自信。

sentence: In regards to saving money, the more the better.
sentence_trans: 对于存钱这件事，当然是多多益善。

sentence: This is the first time the family set foot in their new house.
sentence_trans: 这是这家人第一次踏进他们的新家。

mean_cn: phr. 一个接着一个，陆续
sentence: The planes take off one after the other.
sentence_trans: 飞机一架接一架地起飞。

sentence: The car was travelling at full speed.
sentence_trans: 汽车正全速行进。

mean_cn: phr. 和…相当，比得上，犹如
sentence: The alcohol percentage of whisky is comparable to that of vodka.
sentence_trans: 威士忌与伏特加的酒精度含量相当。

sentence: There are a variety of nuts here.
sentence_trans: 这里有各种各样的坚果。

sentence: Her boss seemed to think highly of her.
sentence_trans: 她的老板似乎很器重她。

sentence: Please, bring me the steak medium rare.
sentence_trans: 我的牛排要3分熟，谢谢。

sentence: If you think it's ok, you can sign a contract with the owner.
sentence_trans: 如果你觉得可以的话，你可以和户主签合同。

mean_cn: phr. 职业生涯规划，职业规划
sentence: Starting now, I'm going to begin the process of career planning.
sentence_trans: 我现在就开始我的职业规划。

sentence: He had to work all day and all night to finish the project in time.
sentence_trans: 他必须整日整夜地工作来按时完成工作。

mean_cn: phr. 看见，出现，表示看见
sentence: The sunrise came in sight as I neared the top of the mountain.
sentence_trans: 爬到山顶时，我看到了最美的日出。

sentence: Our spending has been narrowed down to a normal level.
sentence_trans: 我们的支出已经削减到了正常水平。

sentence: She has been laid off because she didn't do her job properly.
sentence_trans: 她因为没有做好该做的工作而被解雇。

sentence: This fat man spends 5 hours a day in the gym in an effort to lose weight.
sentence_trans: 为了减肥，这个胖子一天要在健身房待五个小时。

sentence: I'm so moved by seeing the small plant struggling to survive in bad conditions.
sentence_trans: 看见弱小的植物在糟糕的环境中挣扎着生存，我十分感动。

sentence: A multitude of cars are parked side by side.
sentence_trans: 许多车紧挨着停在一起。

sentence: The doctor is convinced of the benefits of a healthy lifestyle.
sentence_trans: 医生深信有一个好的生活习惯是有益的。

mean_cn: phr. 提醒某人快做某事
sentence: His business partner had to chase him up for his payment.
sentence_trans: 他的生意伙伴不得不提醒他赶紧还钱。

sentence: My grandmother patched up my old jeans.
sentence_trans: 我的奶奶修补了我的旧牛仔裤。

sentence: The stars grow at the rate of one per day.
sentence_trans: 星星以一天一个的速度增加。

sentence: My dog's eyes are fixed on the food in my hands.
sentence_trans: 我的狗一直盯着我手里的食物。

sentence: Children are queuing up to buy tickets for the show.
sentence_trans: 孩子们在排队买票去看演出。

sentence: The delicious milkshake is made up of raspberries and blueberries.
sentence_trans: 这杯好喝的奶昔是由树莓和蓝莓做成的。

sentence: The dog is trying to dig out something on the beach.
sentence_trans: 这只狗正在沙滩上试图挖出什么东西。

sentence: They played a joke on him by putting a "kick me" note on his back.
sentence_trans: 他们对他开了个玩笑，在他背上放了个“踢我”的纸条。

sentence: She likes to read books in order to expand her knowledge of the universe.
sentence_trans: 她喜欢读书，以此来增长对宇宙知识的了解。

sentence: Being stressed out all the time is not good for your health.
sentence_trans: 一直紧张对你的健康不利。

sentence: They are in conflict with each other about which way is best.
sentence_trans: 他们就哪个是最佳方案产生了争执。

sentence: I would never submit to working under the heel of my female boss!
sentence_trans: 我不会屈服于女上司的践踏！

sentence: Her family paid for a stair lift to satisfy her needs.
sentence_trans: 她的家人给她买了个升降椅来满足她的需求。

sentence: To begin with, you plant a small seed.
sentence_trans: 首先，你应该种下一颗种子。

sentence: That boss speaks well of the employee of the month.
sentence_trans: 那位老板称赞了这个月的最佳员工。

sentence: Nice to make your acquaintance, I've heard a lot about you.
sentence_trans: 很高兴与你相识，久仰大名。

sentence: Will humans be replaced with robots in the future?
sentence_trans: 人类在未来会被机器人取代吗？

sentence: The cat is furious with his owner for being forced to take a bath.
sentence_trans: 这只猫对主人很生气，因为主人强迫它洗澡。

sentence: They decided to cooperate with each other to get the job done.
sentence_trans: 他们决定彼此合作以完成这个工作。

sentence: The housewife is getting tired of all the housework.
sentence_trans: 这位家庭主妇开始所有家务事感到厌倦。

sentence: They were put into prison because of the crimes they have committed.
sentence_trans: 他们因为犯罪而被关进监狱。

mean_cn: phr. 对某事很严格，对某事严格要求
sentence: Our boss is strict about the quality of our work.
sentence_trans: 我们的领导严格要求我们的工作质量。

mean_cn: phr. 有眼光，对…有鉴赏力
sentence: The stylist has an eye for detail, so each outfit is beautifully coordinated.
sentence_trans: 这个时装博主在穿衣服上很有眼光。

sentence: I'm sick of pizza! Don't make me eat it again!
sentence_trans: 我已经吃腻披萨了！不要再让我吃了！

sentence: Our workers are all equipped with health and safety clothing.
sentence_trans: 我们的工人都配备了这样的健康和安全保护装备。

sentence: The two cars collided with each other.
sentence_trans: 这两辆车和对方撞在了一起。

sentence: That puppy is jealous of the other because it has no ball to play with.
sentence_trans: 那只小狗嫉妒这只玩球的小狗，因为它没有球。

sentence: My teacher is very serious and his face is devoid of expression.
sentence_trans: 我的老师总是很严肃并且面无表情。

sentence: The history of this high school dates back to Han Dynasty.
sentence_trans: 石室中学的前身可以追溯到汉代。

sentence: The detective is spying on the suspects.
sentence_trans: 侦探正暗中监视着嫌疑人。

sentence: There is a severe shortage of water in the little boy's hometown.
sentence_trans: 小男孩的家乡遭遇了严重的水资源短缺。

mean_cn: phr. 对…有信心；对……充满信心
sentence: Her smile shows that she is really confident in her upcoming interview.
sentence_trans: 她的微笑表明她对即将到来的面试充满自信。

sentence: Why don't you come out? Are you scared?
sentence_trans: 你怎么不出来？你害怕吗？

sentence: He works so hard in order that he can afford his mother's medical expenses.
sentence_trans: 为了能负担母亲的医药费，他努力工作。

sentence: This map shows the countries in the Middle East.
sentence_trans: 这个地图展示了中东地区的国家。

sentence: He's amazing—how can he juggle so many balls at once?
sentence_trans: 他太棒了，他是如何同时耍这么多球的？

mean_cn: phr. 一块，一张，一根，一片
sentence: There is a piece of bread on the plate.
sentence_trans: 盘子里有一片面包。

sentence: I won the race, and I have a gold medal to prove it!
sentence_trans: 我赢得了这场比赛，我有金牌作证！

sentence: This department store sells many different kinds of goods.
sentence_trans: 这家百货商场出售许多不同种类的商品。

sentence: She wore protective gear for her eyes and ears during shooting practice.
sentence_trans: 射击训练中，她戴着保护眼睛和耳朵的防护装备。

sentence: There is a river running through the canyon.
sentence_trans: 有一条河流经这道峡谷。

sentence: Now that it is raining outside, I'd better stay at home.
sentence_trans: 既然外面下雨，那我最好还是呆家里吧。

sentence: Inflation is moving downwards.
sentence_trans: 通货膨胀率正呈下降趋势。

sentence: I eat neither fries nor hamburgers since I'm on a diet.
sentence_trans: 我在减肥，所以既不吃薯条也不吃汉堡。

sentence: These two people had a cold.
sentence_trans: 这两个人患上了感冒。

sentence: Look, this diamond is as big as a pigeon egg.
sentence_trans: 看，这颗钻石竟然像鸽子蛋那么大。

sentence: This guy appears to be very proud of himself.
sentence_trans: 这个男人看起来很为自己骄傲。

sentence: There are some letters in the letter-box.
sentence_trans: 信箱里有一些信件。

sentence: He went swimming every now and then.
sentence_trans: 他时不时会去游泳。

sentence: His business plan was unsuccessful.
sentence_trans: 他的商业计划失败了。

sentence: Gymnastic exercise can help us maintain a good body shape.
sentence_trans: 体操可以帮助我们保持好的形体。

sentence: He is not as tall as his big brother.
sentence_trans: 他不像他哥哥那样高。

mean_cn: adj. 愚蠢的，头脑简单的
sentence: The simple-minded  person thinks he can go to the moon through a hot-air balloon.
sentence_trans: 这个头脑简单的人认为他可以通过坐热气球去月球。

sentence: The little girl often goes roller skating in the park on weekend mornings.
sentence_trans: 这个小女孩经常在周末的早上去公园滑旱冰。

sentence: You should stop driving when the light turns red.
sentence_trans: 你应该在红灯时停车。

sentence: Look ahead into your future instead of dwelling on your past.
sentence_trans: 着眼你的未来，而不是停留在过去。

sentence: They are husband and wife from now on.
sentence_trans: 从现在起他们就是夫妻了。

sentence: She is filling her bottle with water.
sentence_trans: 她在往瓶子里装水。

sentence: The little girl is looking at the boat that is far away, out at sea.
sentence_trans: 那个小女孩正看着海上那遥远的小船。

mean_cn: n. 牡鹿；不带女伴的舞客；  adj. 全是男人的；  v. 不带女伴参加晚会
sentence: The stag is an adult male red deer.
sentence_trans: 牡鹿是成年雄性马鹿。

sentence: He went on with his writing after drinking some water.
sentence_trans: 他去喝了些水后又继续写作了。

sentence: Beans are a raw material used to make coffee.
sentence_trans: 咖啡豆是制作咖啡的原材料。

sentence: Have you ever used a tape recorder?
sentence_trans: 你用过盒式录音机吗？

sentence: He's worried because he's out of work.
sentence_trans: 因为失业，他很忧愁。

mean_cn: n. 无能，无能为力，没办法
sentence: He has an inability to distinguish red from green.
sentence_trans: 他无法分辨红色和绿色。

sentence: We can watch TV at my house.
sentence_trans: 我们可以在我家看电视。

sentence: I'm the only one still unmarried out of my friends.
sentence_trans: 我是我朋友里唯一仍然未婚的。

sentence: There is only a bit of rice left in the pot.
sentence_trans: 锅里只剩一点点饭了。

sentence: I left some money on the table due to the service charge.
sentence_trans: 由于要付服务费，我留了些钱在桌子上。

mean_cn: phr. 关掉（水、电、电视、收音机等）
sentence: It's time to turn off the TV and go to sleep.
sentence_trans: 是时候关掉电视去睡觉了。

sentence: Having a playmate is better than playing alone.
sentence_trans: 有个玩伴比独自一人好玩得多。

sentence: A fish's fins are the flat parts which stick out of its body.
sentence_trans: 鱼鳍是指从鱼身体伸出去的扁平部位。

sentence: Roast turkey is a traditional food served on Thanksgiving.
sentence_trans: 烤火鸡是感恩节的传统食物。

sentence: Some kinds of food are good for health such as fruit.
sentence_trans: 有些食物，例如水果，对身体有好处。

sentence: I take letters out from the postbox every day.
sentence_trans: 我每天把信从邮箱里取出来。

sentence: He's a daily viewer of his favorite TV show.
sentence_trans: 他每天都要看他喜欢的电视节目。

sentence: Both basketball and football are my favorite sports.
sentence_trans: 篮球和足球都是我最爱的运动项目。

sentence: The bowler believes red bowling ball brings him good luck.
sentence_trans: 这位保龄球手相信红色的保龄球能带给他好运。

sentence: The kid likes to drink fruit juice.
sentence_trans: 那个孩子喜欢喝果汁。

mean_cn: adj. 牢不可破的，不易破损的
sentence: This iron door seems to be unbreakable.
sentence_trans: 这扇铁门看起来牢不可破。

mean_cn: adj. 右手的，惯于使用右手的
sentence: You can tell which baby is right-handed by watching them eat.
sentence_trans: 你可以通过看宝宝们吃饭来分辨出哪一个是右撇子。

sentence: Sydney Opera House is a famous building around the world.
sentence_trans: 悉尼歌剧院是一座举世闻名的建筑。

sentence: I bought a golden birdcage for my pet bird.
sentence_trans: 我为我的宠物鸟买了一个金色鸟笼。

sentence: People are watching beautiful fireworks in the night sky.
sentence_trans: 人们正在观看夜空中美丽的烟花。

sentence: This sign shows that the lost and found is here.
sentence_trans: 这个标示表明这里是失物招领处。

sentence: Try taking a tour of London on a double-decker bus.
sentence_trans: 试着坐双层巴士游览伦敦吧。

sentence: The homework is too much to cope with.
sentence_trans: 作业实在太多了，以至于我难以承受。

sentence: I cut up this mango to make it easier to eat.
sentence_trans: 我把这个芒果切碎了，更方便吃。

sentence: I wear a bathrobe and drink coffee after a bath.
sentence_trans: 洗完澡后，我穿着浴袍喝了点咖啡。

mean_cn: n. 指示，指令；  adj. 指导的，管理的
sentence: We provide paper bags instead of plastic ones in accordance with the government directive.
sentence_trans: 根据政府指令，我们不再提供塑料袋，而是提供纸袋子。

sentence: This tool is not only a knife but also a corkscrew.
sentence_trans: 这个工具不仅是一把刀，还是一个开瓶器。

sentence: The wedding took place by the lake.
sentence_trans: 婚礼在湖边举行。

sentence: The girl in blue was a few meters ahead of me.
sentence_trans: 那个穿蓝色衣服的女孩就在我前面几米。

sentence: Don't worry so much about the exam. Just do your best.
sentence_trans: 别为考试担心太多啦，尽力就好。

sentence: They stood together and talked about their favorite coffee.
sentence_trans: 他们站在一起，谈论起了最爱喝的咖啡。

sentence: The playroom has all kinds of toys for all kinds of girls and boys.
sentence_trans: 游戏室为所有男孩和女孩们提供各式各样的玩具。

sentence: There are some clothes in this washing machine.
sentence_trans: 这台洗衣机里有一些衣服。

sentence: This statue is a symbol of fairness.
sentence_trans: 这座雕像是公平的象征。

sentence: After all these years, I still love the sweetness of a lollipop.
sentence_trans: 这么多年以后，我还是很爱棒棒糖的甜味。

sentence: She is holding many dandelions in her hands.
sentence_trans: 她手里拿着许多蒲公英。

sentence: She earns her living by selling flowers.
sentence_trans: 她靠卖花来挣钱谋生。

sentence: They like to go for a walk with their dog.
sentence_trans: 他们喜欢带着他们的狗去散步。

sentence: Today I have to do some cleaning at home.
sentence_trans: 今天我得在家打扫卫生。

sentence: Moscow is a big city in Russia.
sentence_trans: 莫斯科是俄罗斯的大城市。

sentence: The two puppies are good friends.
sentence_trans: 这两只小狗是好朋友。

sentence: The girl has a number of books to read.
sentence_trans: 这个女生有许多书要读。

sentence: They have lived there ever since they were married.
sentence_trans: 这一对老夫妻从结婚起就住在那里。

sentence: She is puzzled about this question.
sentence_trans: 对这个问题她感到很迷惑。

sentence: The wounded soldier goes to the doctor every day.
sentence_trans: 这位负伤的士兵每天都去看医生。

sentence: The lava flowed down the slope into the sea.
sentence_trans: 熔岩沿坡面而下，流进了海里。

sentence: If you don't need it, throw it away into a litter bin.
sentence_trans: 如果你不需要这个了，就把它丢在垃圾箱里。

mean_cn: n. 不满，不平；令人不满的事物
sentence: The couple expressed dissatisfaction with the food to the waiter.
sentence_trans: 这对夫妇向服务员表达了对食物的不满。

sentence: I don't have any work today, so I'm just going to take it easy.
sentence_trans: 今天我没有任何工作要做，所以我一点儿也不着急。

sentence: Lots of people are attending the concert.
sentence_trans: 许多人参加了这场演唱会。

sentence: I can hold my breath for 47 seconds. Watch me.
sentence_trans: 我能憋气47秒，看我。

sentence: Our family will do some shopping together at the supermarket.
sentence_trans: 我们一家人要在这个超市一起购物。

sentence: There are a pair of shoes, socks, and gloves in the suitcase.
sentence_trans: 手提箱里有一双鞋、袜子和手套。

sentence: The shop assistant sells vegetables to the woman.
sentence_trans: 售货员在卖蔬菜给这位女顾客。

sentence: That jean miniskirt is stylish and elegant.
sentence_trans: 那条牛仔短裙既时髦又优雅。

sentence: This line is meant to separate blue people from red people.
sentence_trans: 这条线是用来划分小蓝人和小红人的。

sentence: Everyone’s talking of changes nowadays.
sentence_trans: 现在每个人都在谈改变。

sentence: While walking, we should pay careful attention to warning signs!
sentence_trans: 走路时，我们应该多注意路上的警告牌！

sentence: He works in an office by day and drives a taxi by night.
sentence_trans: 他白天在办公室上班，晚上开出租车。

sentence: I finally have my own bank account.
sentence_trans: 我终于有了自己的银行账户。

sentence: These animals are all cold-blooded.
sentence_trans: 这些动物都是冷血动物。

mean_cn: n. 拥抱；  v. 紧贴着身子睡
sentence: This baby needs a cuddle.
sentence_trans: 宝宝需要抱抱。

sentence: Not until reaching 19 years old can you watch this movie.
sentence_trans: 直到满了十九岁，你才能看这部电影。

sentence: Adding a little apple vinegar to the salad makes it more delicious.
sentence_trans: 给沙拉加一点苹果醋会更好吃。

sentence: Radios usually use short wave to receive signals.
sentence_trans: 收音机通常是通过短波来接收信号。

sentence: The little baby was so tired that he fell asleep next to his plate.
sentence_trans: 这个宝宝实在太困，他在盘子旁边睡着了。

sentence: Plants grow faster in the glasshouse.
sentence_trans: 温室里的植物长得格外得快。

sentence: Look! As far as the data shows, something is wrong.
sentence_trans: 瞧！就数据来看，出问题了。

sentence: This sign says that they're open from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m.
sentence_trans: 这个标示说他们的营业时间是从上午9点到下午5点。

sentence: I can take my time when staying at home.
sentence_trans: 当我待在家里时，我可以慢慢消磨时间。

sentence: The old man likes to go fishing alone.
sentence_trans: 这个老人喜欢独自去钓鱼。

sentence: We wish you all the best in the new year.
sentence_trans: 祝你们在新的一年里一切顺利。

mean_cn: phr. 成百万上千万，数以百万计
sentence: There are millions of dollars in the vault.
sentence_trans: 这个金库里有数百万美元。

sentence: When he showed her the message, she opened her mouth in surprise.
sentence_trans: 当他把信息给她看时，她惊讶地张大了嘴。

sentence: By and by, the tree will lose its leaves.
sentence_trans: 渐渐地，这棵树的叶子会落光。

sentence: Belgium's a European country. It's tiny, but they make great waffles.
sentence_trans: 比利时是个欧洲国家，它很小，但是那儿的华夫饼超棒！

sentence: They watch their co-worker presenting his plan.
sentence_trans: 他们看着同事陈述计划。

sentence: The laborer looks very confident.
sentence_trans: 这位工人看起来很自信。

sentence: Gradually, robots have taken the place of manual workers.
sentence_trans: 机器人逐渐取代了手工工人。

sentence: He has been sentenced to death for his crime.
sentence_trans: 由于犯罪，他被判处死刑。

sentence: They love their dog so much that they regard it as part of their family.
sentence_trans: 他们爱狗爱到把它视为家庭中的一员。

sentence: "It's so hot that I'm going to melt! " cried Mr.ice-cream.
sentence_trans: “太热了，我要融化啦！” 冰淇淋先生大声叫道。

sentence: So long as you keep trying, you can always win the race.
sentence_trans: 只要你继续努力，你总能赢得比赛。

sentence: Hey, come up and join in the fun with us!
sentence_trans: 快来加入我们一起玩儿吧！

sentence: The United Kingdom means England, Wales, Scotland, and Northern Ireland.
sentence_trans: 英国包括英格兰、威尔士、苏格兰和北爱尔兰四个地区。

sentence: The man has put on weight and his appearance changed a lot.
sentence_trans: 这个男人长胖了，他的容貌发生了变化。

sentence: There are many cars on show at the convention.
sentence_trans: 展会上有很多汽车在展出。

sentence: Our houses are located right next to each other.
sentence_trans: 我们的房子彼此紧邻。

sentence: The man fell ill, so he had to stay in bed and rest.
sentence_trans: 这个男人病倒了，他必须卧床休息。

sentence: We eat dozens of eggs in a month.
sentence_trans: 一个月里，我们吃了许多鸡蛋。

sentence: The parents were pleased that their son came back home.
sentence_trans: 孩子回家了，父母很开心。

sentence: There're many people dancing at the night club.
sentence_trans: 夜总会上很多人正在跳舞。

sentence: Use the hand truck to move away the parcel.
sentence_trans: 用手推车来搬运包裹。

sentence: Her mood today is so-so.
sentence_trans: 她今天心情一般。

sentence: Let me try on these clothes in the fitting room - I'll be out in a minute.
sentence_trans: 让我去试衣间试一下这些衣服，我一分钟就出来。

sentence: A great many people are visiting the Great Wall!
sentence_trans: 好多人在参观长城呢！

sentence: Most ski resorts are in hilly countries, for obvious reasons.
sentence_trans: 许多滑雪胜地是在多山的国家，原因很明显。

sentence: The more books you read, the more knowledge you will get.
sentence_trans: 你读的书越多，学到的知识就越多。

sentence: The pool is filled with hundreds of colorful balls.
sentence_trans: 池子里装满了成百上千的彩球。

sentence: You have to get up right now, or you'll be late for school!
sentence_trans: 你必须立即起床了，不然上学就要迟到了！

sentence: His dream of having a dog as a friend is about to come true.
sentence_trans: 他想要养一只狗狗的愿望马上就要成真了。

sentence: The kids behaved as though they were doctors.
sentence_trans: 孩子们表现得好像他们是医生一样。

sentence: Let me think about your idea for a moment... No!
sentence_trans: 让我考虑一下你的想法⋯⋯不行！

sentence: I usually get up at 7 o'clock in the morning.
sentence_trans: 我通常早上7点钟起床。

mean_cn: n. 跷跷板（游戏）；  v. 摇摆不定
sentence: The children are playing on the see-saw.
sentence_trans: 孩子们在翘翘板上玩。

sentence: All I wanted was a plate of delicious fried foods.
sentence_trans: 我只是想要一盘美味的油炸食物。

sentence: This left-handed girl is painting with her left hand.
sentence_trans: 这个女孩是左撇子，正用左手画画。

mean_cn: adj. 鼓舞人心的，激励人的
sentence: He gave an inspiring speech at the graduation ceremony.
sentence_trans: 他在毕业典礼上作了鼓舞人心的演讲。

sentence: There are many people passing by the busy street.
sentence_trans: 有许多人经过这条繁忙的街道。

sentence: There are not many cars in the underground parking lot.
sentence_trans: 地下停车场里没什么车。

sentence: I don't like too much ginger in my food; I think it tastes too strong.
sentence_trans: 我不喜欢食物里放太多的姜，味道太冲了。

sentence: The market trader is selling some home-grown vegetables.
sentence_trans: 集市商贩正在卖自家种的蔬菜。

sentence: It's midnight, but do I feel sleepy? No, not at all!
sentence_trans: 已经是午夜了，我困吗？不，一点也不困！

sentence: Mr. Rabbit joined up and was a brave solider for the rabbit army.
sentence_trans: 兔子先生参军入伍了，成为了一名勇敢的士兵。

sentence: A trolley bus uses electricity instead of gas.
sentence_trans: 电车用电而不烧油。

mean_cn: phr. 帮助某人解决困难
sentence: He couldn't lift the bucket, so his friend helped him out.
sentence_trans: 他提不起这个桶，所以他的朋友帮了他。

sentence: Today is December 23rd; the day after tomorrow will be Christmas.
sentence_trans: 今天是12月23日，后天就是圣诞节了。

sentence: He used his hand to prevent the other blocks from falling.
sentence_trans: 他用手防止木块倒下。

sentence: We can reach the mountain top either on foot or by cable cars.
sentence_trans: 我们可以徒步或者坐缆车到达山顶。

sentence: I am good at football as well as basketball.
sentence_trans: 我擅长足球，也精通篮球。

sentence: She felt she really connected with the speaker as they shared many similar views.
sentence_trans: 她觉得她跟那位演讲者似乎连接在了一起，因为他们有着许多相似的观点。

mean_cn: phr. 变成；把……变成；转换成
sentence: The ugly duckling changed into a beautiful swan.
sentence_trans: 丑小鸭变成了美丽的白天鹅。

sentence: The flag of Ireland has three colors - green, white and orange.
sentence_trans: 爱尔兰的国旗有三种颜色——绿、白、橙。

sentence: You must write a zip code on the envelope before mailing a letter.
sentence_trans: 寄信前，你必须在信封上写上邮政编码。

sentence: I'm really afraid of wasps!
sentence_trans: 我真是很害怕黄蜂。

sentence: Think about it before you make up your mind.
sentence_trans: 在决定之前要先想一想。

sentence: His bag is different from hers.
sentence_trans: 他的书包和她的不同。

mean_cn: phr. 日夜不停地，不断地
sentence: He's on the computer day and night. He has no time left for me!
sentence_trans: 他没日没夜地在电脑前，都没时间陪我了。

sentence: The ring road around the edge of the town helps to relieve the traffic pressure.
sentence_trans: 城镇边缘的环形公路帮有助于缓解交通压力。

mean_cn: adj. 不真实的；不忠实的
sentence: What is showed in this advertisement is untrue.
sentence_trans: 该广告内容不真实。

sentence: Various books are placed on the bookshelves.
sentence_trans: 书架上摆放了各种各样的书。

sentence: I can vouch for the quality of this product: I guarantee your satisfaction!
sentence_trans: 我能担保这个产品的品质：我保证你会满意！

sentence: His friends came to the airport to see him off.
sentence_trans: 他的朋友们来机场为他送行。

sentence: I put my pencils into this pencil-box.
sentence_trans: 我把铅笔放进了这个铅笔盒中。

sentence: In China, chicken feathers and garlic skin represent unimportant things.
sentence_trans: 在中国，鸡毛和蒜皮代表不重要的事情。

sentence: Wow! The little girl dressed up as if she was a fairy!
sentence_trans: 哇！这个小女孩打扮得像个小仙女！

sentence: As soon as he got home, it stopped raining.
sentence_trans: 他一回家，雨就停了。

sentence: He takes out some money from his wallet.
sentence_trans: 他从钱包里拿了一些钱出来。

sentence: The flower isn't colourful any more.
sentence_trans: 这朵花已不再鲜艳。

sentence: This man is in danger! Somebody save him!
sentence_trans: 这个人有危险！快来人救救他！

sentence: Students have classes all day long.
sentence_trans: 学生们整天都要上课。

sentence: My grandpa still dreams to be a DJ, even though he's 70 years old.
sentence_trans: 尽管爷爷已经70岁了，但是他仍梦想成为DJ。

sentence: The little boy called in help from superman.
sentence_trans: 小男孩向超人寻求帮助。

mean_cn: adj. 苏格兰（人）的；  n. 苏格兰人
sentence: The man dressed in traditional Scottish clothing is playing a traditional musical instrument.
sentence_trans: 这个身穿苏格兰传统服装的人正在演奏一种传统乐器。

mean_cn: adj. 自助的，自我服务的
sentence: Self-service afternoon tea party is very common in company.
sentence_trans: 自助下午茶派对是公司的常见福利。

sentence: Every conflict has a non-violent solution.
sentence_trans: 每个争端都有非暴力的解决方式。

mean_cn: adj. 直达的；中途不停的；  adv. 不停地
sentence: I’m taking a non-stop flight to the US.
sentence_trans: 我乘直达美国的航班。

sentence: Although they live far from each other, they still love each other very much.
sentence_trans: 虽然远隔千里，但是他们仍然深爱彼此。

sentence: The fireman saved the boy's life from the fire.
sentence_trans: 消防员从火灾中救出了小男孩。

sentence: The little boy finally set the bird free.
sentence_trans: 小男孩最终让小鸟获得了自由。

sentence: I love to make friends with new people!
sentence_trans: 我喜欢和陌生人交朋友！

sentence: The father is helping his daughter with her homework.
sentence_trans: 这位父亲正在帮助他的女儿做家庭作业。

sentence: The young boy may have a gift for playing the piano.
sentence_trans: 这个小男孩也许弹钢琴很有天赋。

sentence: This dying flower can be saved, as long as you give it enough water.
sentence_trans: 只要你给它足够的水，这朵枯萎的花就能被救活。

sentence: Let me congratulate you on graduating with such a good degree.
sentence_trans: 让我祝贺你，带着这么好的学位毕业了！

sentence: In the mall, you can buy all kinds of clothes.
sentence_trans: 在商场里，你可以买到各种各样的衣服。

sentence: There are a lot of colorful hand-made lucky stars.
sentence_trans: 这里有许多各种颜色的手折幸运星。

sentence: This Walkman uses a cassette tape to play music.
sentence_trans: 这款随声听需要一盘磁带才能播放音乐。

mean_cn: n. 气象员，预报天气的人
sentence: The weatherman says it will be sunny tomorrow.
sentence_trans: 天气预报员说明天将会是晴天。

mean_cn: phr. 人传人地；口口相传地
sentence: The delightful news passed from mouth to mouth.
sentence_trans: 这个振奋人心的消息一传十，十传百。

sentence: Let's go to the information desk to get some help.
sentence_trans: 我们去问讯处寻求帮助吧。

mean_cn: n. 过度的使用；  vt. 使用…过度
sentence: She got shortsightedness for overusing her phone.
sentence_trans: 她因过度使用手机而得了近视。

mean_cn: n. 守财奴，吝啬鬼，（石油）凿井机
sentence: It's good to save money, but you shouldn't be a miser.
sentence_trans: 省钱当然好，但你不应该做一个守财奴。

sentence: I swear I will keep my word.
sentence_trans: 我发誓我会守信用的。

sentence: The man's gesture shows that he looks down upon someone.
sentence_trans: 这个男人的手势表明他看不起某个人。

sentence: She didn't feel welcome at home so she decided to go away.
sentence_trans: 她在家感觉不受欢迎，所以决定离开。

sentence: They are all enjoying themselves at the beach.
sentence_trans: 他们在海边都过得很愉快。

sentence: The girl is knocking at the door.
sentence_trans: 这个女孩正在敲门。

sentence: I've been waiting for you for a long time! Come in!
sentence_trans: 我等了你好久啦！进来吧！

sentence: New York is a busy and modern city.
sentence_trans: 纽约是一个繁华和现代的城市。

sentence: The students are warming up in the physical education class.
sentence_trans: 这些学生正在体育课上热身。

sentence: You can have a seat at this bus stop.
sentence_trans: 在这个公共汽车站有座位可以坐。

sentence: She received several emails and read one of them.
sentence_trans: 她收到了几封邮件，并阅读了其中一封。

mean_cn: v. 改变方向；转变用途
sentence: The signs are there to redirect traffic.
sentence_trans: 这些标志是放在这调整车流方向的。

mean_cn: n. 桅，桅杆，柱；  v. 装桅杆于
sentence: The captain of the ship told me to raise the mast.
sentence_trans: 船长命令我升起桅杆。

sentence: Those radicals are supporting the left-wing party to win the election.
sentence_trans: 这些激进分子支持左翼分子赢得大选。

sentence: This boy listened to music over the radio.
sentence_trans: 小男孩在收音机上听音乐。

sentence: Her step-mother treats her very good.
sentence_trans: 她的继母对她非常好。

sentence: We are a chain store and currently have 18 stores!
sentence_trans: 我们是一家连锁店，现在有18家店面。

sentence: That's my magic castle, and this is my pet unicorn, Daisy.
sentence_trans: 那边是我的魔法城堡，这是我的宠物独角兽黛西。

sentence: I divided the hamburger into halves so I can share it with my friend.
sentence_trans: 我把汉堡分成了两半，这样我就可以和我的朋友分享了。

mean_cn: n. 美国（美利坚合众国）
sentence: The Statue of Liberty is located in New York City, USA.
sentence_trans: 自由女神像位于美国纽约。

sentence: It takes a good many apples to make a liter of apple juice.
sentence_trans: 要榨一升苹果汁需要许多苹果。

sentence: When I think of Tibet, snow-capped mountains, grasslands and the Potala Palace come to mind.
sentence_trans: 当我想到西藏时，脑海中浮现出雪山、草原和布达拉宫。

sentence: Students should listen attentively to their teacher in class.
sentence_trans: 学生在课堂上应该注意听老师讲课。

sentence: She chose to eat an apple rather than dessert.
sentence_trans: 她选择吃苹果而不是甜点。

sentence: The school-leaver has finished his time at the school.
sentence_trans: 这名毕业生的校园时光已经结束了。

sentence: The goods on the top shelf have been sold out.
sentence_trans: 货架最上面那层的商品都卖光了。

mean_cn: n. 护理；看护；  adj. 喂奶的
sentence: Nursing is the practice of caring for sick and injured people.
sentence_trans: 护理就是指照顾病人和伤者。

sentence: Japanese people always write their family name beside the door.
sentence_trans: 日本人总是在门边写上自己的家族姓氏。

sentence: Tomorrow is Monday! You had better finish your homework before then.
sentence_trans: 明天就是星期一了！你最好在那之前完成作业。

sentence: Living in England, she is used to it raining every day.
sentence_trans: 住在英国，她习惯了每天下雨。

sentence: The tower is able to send out a signal to all the cell phones in the city.
sentence_trans: 这座塔能向城中的所有手机发射信号。

sentence: There are usually five workdays in a week.
sentence_trans: 通常一周有五个工作日。

sentence: The grandparents are going to visit their grandchildren.
sentence_trans: 爷爷奶奶要去看望孙子孙女。

sentence: The little boy stuck out his tongue and made a face.
sentence_trans: 那个小男孩伸出舌头做了个鬼脸。

sentence: The beekeeper can collect the honey from these beehives.
sentence_trans: 养蜂人可以从这些蜂箱里收集蜂蜜。

sentence: My mom used to read to me when I was younger, but now I read by myself.
sentence_trans: 小时候，妈妈常常读书给我听，但是现在，我可以自己读书了。

sentence: The animals are playing on the slide one after another.
sentence_trans: 动物们一个接一个地玩滑梯。

sentence: The kiwi bird is New Zealand's national symbol.
sentence_trans: 几维鸟是新西兰的标志。

mean_cn: phr. 不停做某事；继续做某事
sentence: She keeps listening to music for a whole day.
sentence_trans: 她一整天都在不停地听音乐。

sentence: The symphony orchestra put on a performance last night, which we thought was excellent.
sentence_trans: 这支交响乐团昨晚举行了一场我们认为超赞的演奏。

sentence: The father is having fun with his kids.
sentence_trans: 爸爸和他的孩子正玩得开心。

mean_cn: phr. 玩得高兴，过得愉快
sentence: These young people are having a good time on the beach.
sentence_trans: 这些年轻人在海滩上玩得很开心。

sentence: That salesman keeps knocking at my door again and again.
sentence_trans: 那个推销员一遍又一遍地敲着我的门。

sentence: It's unsafe to touch the switch with wet hands.
sentence_trans: 湿手触碰开关是很不安全的。

sentence: This graph is made up of 4 parts.
sentence_trans: 这幅图由四部分组成。

mean_cn: adj. 爱尔兰的，爱尔兰人的，爱尔兰语的
sentence: The Irish people are known for their beer and dancing.
sentence_trans: 爱尔兰人以他们的啤酒和舞蹈而出名。

mean_cn: phr. 打开（水、电视、收音机、灯、煤气等）
sentence: It was so hot that she wanted to turn on the fan.
sentence_trans: 天气太热了，她想打开风扇。

mean_cn: n. 交通指挥灯，红绿灯
sentence: The traffic lights ensure the safety of traffic participants.
sentence_trans: 红绿灯保证了交通参与者的安全。

sentence: A boy is having fun in the swimming pool.
sentence_trans: 小男孩在泳池里玩儿得很开心。

sentence: It is universally accepted that the earth moves around the sun.
sentence_trans: 大家普遍认为地球绕着太阳转。

sentence: We're playing hide and seek. You go hide, and I'll try to find you!
sentence_trans: 我们在玩捉迷藏，你们去躲起来，我来找你！

sentence: I always have my lunch in the nearby snack bar.
sentence_trans: 我总在附近一家快餐店吃午餐。

mean_cn: n. 背包；  vi. 背上背包出游
sentence: I've fit everything I need to travel around the world into a single backpack.
sentence_trans: 我把环球旅行所需要的东西都装到了一个背包里。

sentence: I must go right now, or else I'll be late for work.
sentence_trans: 我必须马上走，不然上班就迟到了。

sentence: I had planned to see him just the other day.
sentence_trans: 我前几天计划去见他。

sentence: I arrived at Tiananmen Square for the first time.
sentence_trans: 我到天安门了，这是我第一次来。

sentence: The day before yesterday was Valentine's Day.
sentence_trans: 前天是情人节。

sentence: He shut up right away once he realized the teacher was standing behind him.
sentence_trans: 他发现老师站在自己背后时，就立即闭嘴了。

sentence: He had to work even if he was injured.
sentence_trans: 即使受伤了，他还得继续工作！

sentence: Diamonds and gold last for ever, and so will our love.
sentence_trans: 宝石和金子能够永存，我们的爱也是。

sentence: The couple always take care of each other.
sentence_trans: 这对夫妇总是互相照顾。

sentence: He comes from an outlying village to study in the city.
sentence_trans: 他来自一个偏远的村庄，现在在城市学习。

sentence: He has decided to break away from the group.
sentence_trans: 他决定脱离这个团体。

sentence: There are three red telephone boxes in the park.
sentence_trans: 公园里有三个红色的电话亭。

sentence: Thanks, I don't want a beer—I'd rather have a soft drink.
sentence_trans: 谢谢，我不要啤酒，我宁愿喝软饮料。

sentence: Not till eight o'clock did I get up.
sentence_trans: 直到八点我才起床。

sentence: The little boy wrote to his grandfather happily.
sentence_trans: 小男孩高兴地给爷爷写信。

sentence: The police stopped the driver who disobeyed the rules.
sentence_trans: 警察拦下了这个违反交通规则的司机。

sentence: After class, a classmate came forward to clean the blackboard.
sentence_trans: 课后，一位同学上前擦黑板。

sentence: Damao's and Sanmao's wives are my sisters-in-law.
sentence_trans: 大毛和三毛的老婆是我的嫂子和弟妹。

sentence: This white car is driving on the side road.
sentence_trans: 这辆白色的汽车正在岔道上行驶。

sentence: The thief was clever enough to run away with stolen money before the police arrived.
sentence_trans: 这个贼很狡猾，在警察赶到之前拿着钱逃跑了。

sentence: The sign shows that this is a smoke-free zone.
sentence_trans: 这个标志表明这里是无烟区。

sentence: His grandma is teaching him good table manners.
sentence_trans: 奶奶在教他良好的餐桌礼仪。

mean_cn: phr. 人行横道线（斑马线）
sentence: People can walk across the zebra crossing when they see the Green Man.
sentence_trans: 绿灯亮时，行人就可以通过斑马线。

sentence: The small boy will grow up to be a strong man one day.
sentence_trans: 弱小的男孩也会有成为强壮男人的那一天。

sentence: He has a great deal of work to do.
sentence_trans: 他有大量的工作要做。

sentence: The heater kept our house warm in the winter.
sentence_trans: 冬天里，房间里靠加热器供暖。

sentence: I took my best friend in my arms and gave her a big hug.
sentence_trans: 我抱住我最好的朋友，给了她一个大大的拥抱。

sentence: We have to clean our house. First of all, let's sweep the floor.
sentence_trans: 我们需要把房子打扫一下。首先，让我们来把地扫了。

sentence: It wasn't until I got close to the end that I realized I had won the race.
sentence_trans: 直到我接近终点我才意识到我已经赢得了比赛。

sentence: Bring an umbrella, or else you'll get wet!
sentence_trans: 你最好带把伞，否则会淋湿的！

sentence: The girl wants to try on this beautiful dress.
sentence_trans: 这个女孩想试穿这条漂亮的裙子。

sentence: She moved to the countryside and began to live in peace.
sentence_trans: 她搬到了乡村，开始安静地生活。

sentence: They are having an interview face to face.
sentence_trans: 她们正在面对面的进行面试。

sentence: My skipping rope keeps me fit!
sentence_trans: 跳绳帮助我保持身材。

sentence: She has many freckles on her face.
sentence_trans: 她脸上有好多雀斑。

sentence: Wow! Thousands of snow geese in flight. What a spectacular sight!
sentence_trans: 哇！成千上万只雪雁在飞翔，多么壮观的景象！

sentence: The man feels like having some sweet peppers.
sentence_trans: 这个人想吃点甜椒。

sentence: Today I spent 22 Euros on lunch—so expensive!
sentence_trans: 今天我花了22欧元吃午餐——好贵呀！

sentence: Is a tomato a kind of fruit?
sentence_trans: 番茄是一种水果吗？

sentence: The people are divided up into four groups.
sentence_trans: 人们被分成了四组。

sentence: They are very strict with their daughter.
sentence_trans: 他们对自己的女儿很严格。

sentence: Iceland is an island that lies off the north west of Europe.
sentence_trans: 冰岛是欧洲以西隔海相望的一个岛屿。

sentence: I wake up at 7 a.m. every day.
sentence_trans: 每天早上我都是7点醒来。

sentence: He is the world record holder of the men's 100-meter race.
sentence_trans: 博尔特是男子一百米短跑世界记录保持者。

sentence: The blue team is taking the lead in the boat race.
sentence_trans: 蓝队目前在划船比赛中领先。

mean_cn: adj. 道德的；凭处方出售的；  n. 处方药
sentence: Putting rubbish into the correct bins is environmentally ethical.
sentence_trans: 分类扔垃圾是一种环保且道德的行为。

sentence: A soldier stands alone on the smoky battleground.
sentence_trans: 一个士兵孤零零地站在硝烟弥漫的战场上。

sentence: Oh, I missed a call from my mother. I'll ring her back.
sentence_trans: 啊，我错过了妈妈的来电，我得给她回电话。

mean_cn: phr. 继续干某事，不停地干某事
sentence: Even though he was tired, he went on working for 12 hours.
sentence_trans: 尽管他十分疲劳，他仍然继续工作了12个小时。

sentence: Lily flowers are often white.
sentence_trans: 百合花通常是白色的。

sentence: A can opener is used to open a can.
sentence_trans: 开罐器是用来开罐头的。

sentence: The United Nations play a positive role in guarding world peace.
sentence_trans: 联合国在守护世界和平方面发挥着积极作用。
